111.title: Oliver shrunk somehow

choices: tells her the truth about himself and wait to see her reaction
doesn't say anything, and leave his fate in Thea's hand
1111.content:
Thea Queen was happy to find out that her brother was still alive...But the fact was Oliver seemed to didn't care about his own family as he often was "doing something else". Her mother Moira felt the same way as Thea, Ollie was back but still away from them, which was frustrating at some point. Thea loved her brother, and expected they'll get time together so she could tell him everythings that happenned to her when he was gone, but she didn't get the chance too. What Oliver could possibly do on day and nights ? She didn't know, but what was certain was that thea's brother actually "died" on that island.

Thea decided to live her life as if Oliver was dead, and did her best to convince herself that the new Oliver was not her brother, but still, this morning she needed for some reason to check his room, after all, she hoped to see her brother still sleeping in his bed, thought she was certain than once again he was not there.

But to Thea's surprise, something was different this time. She actually found her brother in his bed...but he was at the size of a bug ! at first she couldn't believe it and it took her sometimes to realize that this was reality and she was not just dreaming..Oliver Queen..shrunk, at her mercy. Thea couldn't think a better opportunity to make him stay close to her. She first wondered how was that possible, but at the end she didn't really care.

Oliver oppenned his eyes, and realized the same strange thing than his sister : he was shrunk ! He quickly noticed the figure of his giant sister next to him.

" Thea ? What happenned ? Why am i so...small ? " Oliver asked worried. After all it's been years he didn't feel so..helpless. He only started to chase all the names on his father's book, and now he was shrunk, this couldn't be a coincidence !

" I...don't...know...ollie" Thea replied honestly. But something in her gaze was making Oliver more worried than ever.

"Thea, i need you to help me. I have...some contacts that can help, " Oliver said, his fear about his new size was enought to make him feel the need to tell his sister all the truth, thought that he tried to keed secret his identity.

" Contacts ? Ollie will you finally tell me what's going on ?! " Thea said almost angry. " You disappear for days and nights, and now i find you shrunk in your room, and all you say is that you have contacts to help you ?! I don't know who you are !"

Oliver didn't know what to answer, maybe telling her the truth was the best option after all. But he didn't know how Thea would react, and with her giant size, he was competely at her mercy now.

Thea hesitated for a moment, but she decided to grabbed Oliver in her giant fist. Oliver get caught, his arms all along his body, by his own sister and was raised to her giant confused face.

" I'm not sure you're truly my brother..." she began . " I don't recognize you, what are you doing every nights ? Why don't you spend your days with me and Mom ? " The girl asked sadly. It was a strange feeling to have her brother trapper in her hand, but her frustration with him, was taking over everything.

Oliver then..
1111.title: Thea in first seasons !

11111.content:
Oliver sighs, there really was nothing else he could do when faced with an angry Thea 'Speedy, you know all those people who've been attacked by the Hood guy?'

'Yeah, why?' Thea asks, not sure where this was going and hoped it wasn't an attempt to distract her

'That... was me. There's a notebook on my table filled with names, given to me by our dad before... before he shot himself' he shudders, still unable to get the image out of his head

'Wait, you said ... dad really killed himself?' Thea bites her lip, eyes misting slightly

'Yeah Thea, whatever these people did or are going to do, the guilt drove him to kill himself after telling me to fix his mistakes. and that's what I've been doing, taking out one name on that list at a time, sometimes more permanently than I would like. And the annoying thing is I don't even have all the names 'he mutters the last part but he's close enough for Thea to hear him

'Why?' she asks causing Oliver to sigh once more

'Dad didn't exactly explain any of this to me, and I ended up on a deserted island so tried to make a fire. Some pages were sacrificed from what I thought to be a blank notebook before I noticed the names were written in a heat reactive ink. But all that means is I need to take out as many as I can, so the ones that remain don't get any bright ideas'

Thea whistles 'Damn Ollie this is insane, and let's not even begin with the fact you've got quite a few skills you definitely didn't have when you left'

Oliver chuckles mirthlessly 'Of the things I gained from that island, the ability to survive almost anything I am glad for, the fact I know at least 50 ways to kill you... not right now obviously but in general... not so much'

Thea nods as she walks over to the desk and the book, seeing several pages crossed out 'Jeez Ollie you've been busy' she gasps to which he nods

'I know, I've ben trying to send a message, hit hard and fast so they don't try anything funny before I'm done. There's also the chance one of them is the cause of my shrinking'

'Depends, is palmer on the list?' Thea asks mostly as a joke, then has to explain when Oliver looks at her like she's grown a 2nd head (and given she's technically a giantess to him it wouldn't surprise him as much) 'If you weren't my brother Ollie, this situation would be really... intense' she blushes in embarrassment which Oliver mirrors and coughs

'If it makes you feel any better, were you anyone but yourself or mom, I'd probably agree with that statement. Still doesn't explain Palmer though'

'Palmer tech specialises in miniaturisation tech, or miniaturising the necessary components so they can do more with the space they have. So are there any?'

Oliver slightly hates himself a little but he shrugs 'I honestly don't know, I tend to research about 2 pages ahead of myself, but there are a lot of pages in that notepad' Thea nods, putting Oliver down and flicking through The List

'Palmer, Palmer, Palmer... There it is, Anna Palmer' she cheers, googling with her phone then frowning 'It says she's dead, been dead a couple years now. Guess that's a bust'

Oliver nods 'Yeah but it's one less name on the list and one less person wrecking the city. Will you help get me to Fe... my contacts now?' he asks

What happens?

1) This is all way to much for Thea to process, needing time to get her head around everything and not trusting Oliver not to do something stupid at his reduced size, she decides to keep him with her, calling it a chance for them to get reacquainted after so long apart
2) Thea agrees to bring him to try get help... on the condition he trains her and allows her to help. These bastards are wrecking her city too, now she knows she can't just sit back and let them get away with it (Oliver flip-flops between annoyed and proud at Thea's reaction to all this)
11111.title: The only option avalible

choices: Help you. Thea needs to know Ollie's "contacts"
Keep him for a day, whatever he likes it or not
Keep him in her ass for the duration of  lunch
111111.content:
Oliver thought Thea's answer would be obvious and that she would help him, but the girl seemed hesitant. Ollie guessed it was probably too much information for his sister to accept, and this was indeed a great part of what was in Thea's mind right now. But there were another part that he forgot, it was that Thea wanted to have her brother close to her, at last for a whole day. She knew she couldn't be so selfish, the city needed the Hood after all.

" Thea what's wrong ? " he asked uncertain.

" Ollie, here's the deal. You stay with me for a whole day, and please, just PLEASE try to be yourself and relaxed during that time. Then we will focus on your small problem. " She offered.

" Thea, i don't know who's after me but considering i've shrunk in my own bed, that personn knows my identity. So we don't really have time to waste before he tries to attack our Mansion. " He explained, feeling sorry that he had to disappoint his sister.

" Don't you trust our bodyguards and our securities system ? "

" Not since i became The Hood. Please Thea, i can promise you a whole day together once i'll be normal sized again."

Thea thought for a moment, Ollie had a point, but her heart was talking more than her brain right now. Oliver was small, in her hand, and she wanted just a single day, who could possibly attack the Queen's Mansion till then ? As she was about to give her answer, both Ollie and Thea heard a familiar voice as Moira Queen entere the room, forcing Thea to turn back, keeping her hand holding Ollie hidden in the back.

" Oliver don't make me...Thea ? Where's your brother ? " The mature woman asked, not surprise thought that her son was not there.

" He...didn't spend the night at home, as usual. " The girl replied, knowing that sadly, it was probably one of the firsts night that Oliver slept at the Mansion, but she couldn't tell the truth to her mom, not yet.

" Well, at last i have you for the lunch. We'll have some guests and i'm counting on you, since i can't count on your brother. " Moira said.

" Sure." Thea's answer was suspicious. Moira thought she would have to fight again with her daughter, but for some reason she just accepted. " I'll see you later then..." the mother left the room, and Thea brought back Oliver in front of her face.

" Thea, please next time don't squeeze too hard, and don't keep your hand near your...ass. " Oliver said with embarrassment.

" Sorry about that, i was just too scared mom finds you like this...Plus, i've choose to..."
111111.title: Negociations

choices: Thea keeps him in her ass hoping he won't try get away during their day together
She lets him out so they can do something fun together as siblings
1111113.content:
'...that if I have to sit through Mom's boring lunches, you're coming with me' Thea answers, to which Oliver gapes

'Thea I can't go to this thing, I'm bug sized, how the hell could we explain that?' he asks, yelling more due to his reduced size rather than anger (or at least Thea assumes so)

'Relax little brother...' Thea chuckles at her own joke '...I never said you were going to make a public appearance' she then grins, one that sends a shiver down Oliver's spine, he'd seen that same look on Walker and Talia, but due to her size, his little sister scared him the most.

'That are you planning?'

'You you're going to attend the lunch, in my butt' she patts her cute ass with her free hand, smiling widely as she does

'Are you kidding me? I don't want to spend the day in your ass' Oliver yells and this time even Thea knows it's definitely anger

'Really Ollie, it's just for the lunch, that's like an hour tops. Besides it's the best option you have, the others being my bra or my shoe. I don't know if you're any more durable at this size, and don't want to find out you're not by stepping on you and hearing you go crunch' Thea explains

'Makes sense, and your...' Oliver can't say it so just mines her general upper body. causing her to laugh

'My brother, can kick the shit out of street thugs but can't say breasts around his big little sister. But really, you don't want to be near my ass, if I'm being honest I don't really want you there either, but there was no way I was going to let you touch my breasts... unless you want to?' Thea smirks, bringing him rather close to the small amount of cleavage she was sporting

'NO, NO, I'm fine, really don't need to see my sister's breasts any time soon or ever at all' Oliver quickly relents causing Thea to chuckle

'Exactly. So as you can see, my ass is your only option, so try not die back there' she teases lightly before using her free hand to peel back her pants and underwear, revealing her rather pale ass to Oliver. Internally she's cackling that even considering how much of a man whore Oliver used to be, the biggest ass he'll ever see belongs to his little sister, just before she slides him into her crack, then lets go of the clothing, letting it snap back into place. A quick shimmy of her hips and she's back to normal, as though she doesn't have a bug sized vigilante in her ass.

Oliver just couldn't catch a break could he: shrinking down to bug size, getting caught by his (rightfully) annoyed little sister, being forced to reveal himself to her, and now he's trapped in her ass for at least the next hour or so. And it was not going to be pleasant for him, sure Thea took good care of her body so even her ass smelled of fruits and flowers but her strong gluts slammed into him quite strongly with every step, at least in his mind answering the increased durability question: if her were normal sized doing an equivalent of this he'd be dead by now. He hoped he'd have a reprieve when she sat down but NOPE, not only did she flop down rather carelessly but Thea Queen was if nothing else queen of the fidgeters, constantly shifting her positon and seat as things went on, some she probably didn't even notice she was doing, but Oliver did, when her every move basically drops a mountain on top of him he couldn't not.

Thea sighs as she listens to her mother drone on and on about something she really didn't care about, which didn't help with trying to keep her mind off playing with the helpless being trapped between her ass cheeks, at his size it didn't matter to her subconscious he was her brother, as long as he didn't go anywhere 'naughty' it didn't matter to her, he was just something to toy with. Which was why she was trying to subtly do some of the iron buns exercises she'd seen on the tv, tone her perky rear and play with little Ollie, 2 birds, one butt.

'You okay there Thea?' the youngest Queen turns, seeing Malcolm Merlyn beside her looking concerned, she smiles, since the ship sank him and Walter had been a real help with this family, she felt she could tell him anything... didn't mean she was going to tell him everything though, this was her little secret to keep.

'I'm fine, just dealing with somethings, plus these lunches bore me to tears' she answers quietly, mostly so Moria can't here her and give her the patented 'disapproving stare' that had become common between them these last few years. Merlyn nods and puts his hand on her shoulder

'You know if you need anything, I'm there for you right'

Thea smiles and nods 'Yeah, I know. You've been good to our family. You're a good man'

When the lunch ended Thea couldn't leave fast enough, if it had been a few years later there would be speculation Thea had become a speedster, but for now it was just weird she was gone in like a second.

So now she's done with her obligations and it's just her and Oliver in her room, what will she do with Oliver next?

11111132.title: She lets him out so they can do something fun t...

111112.content:
Thea gains a thoughtful look before she answers 'Okay Ollie, I'll take you to your contact... as long as you allow me to help with this hood business'

Oliver blinks, he must be mistaken 'Are you kidding Thea? This isn't a game...'

'It's not only your problem either Oliver' Thea retorts, the shrunken vigilante slightly cowed by the fact she's calling him by his actual name 'He was my dad too, this burden is left on his children's shoulders and I'm not letting you do this alone. So either let me help or I'm just going to keep you here with me till you do, there's no way I'm letting you go anywhere at your current size alone'

Oliver's mouth opens and closes a few times without sound coming out before finally sighing 'Speedy... fine we're doing this, but you're not going out on missions till I think you're skilled enough to handle yourself, especially if I'm not back to normal size by then. Agreed?'

'You got it Ollie' Thea cheers, nuzzling the shrunken Hood to her cheek, making him blush at the awkwardness or Thea's random affections at her current size 'So, where to?'

'Verdant. I have a base beneath the Club, once their my contact should either be there or there will be working coms to get in touch with her' Oliver explains, Thea nods and quickly drops him into the breast pocket of her shirt before running out the door, unfortunately due to his size and location there was nothing Oliver could or would grab so he was bounced around in her enthusiasm to get there, until she got to her motorcycle, then the bouncing stopped and was replaced by a gentle though constant vibration of the vehicle as she speeds through traffic to make it to the currently empty nightclub.

Once she was inside, only then did she remove Oliver from her pocket 'So, what now?' she asks

'Go to the door to the basement...'

'You don't have a basement'

'Yes I do, it's just used for vigilante duties. Anyway, go to the door and enter the code I tell you, then we can see if she's there or not'

'Can't we just get her attention through the cameras?'

'No, it's quite possible she's not watching them, no need to when the club should be closed after all' Oliver replies, to which Thea nods. following the instructions and entering the 'Arrowcave' (Okay that was probably the other one, but it still counts), where she see's a surprisingly familiar face

'Felicity?'

'Thea?!' the blond yelps 'You're not supposed to be down here, I mean, what are you doing here I missed you' she blabbers on before getting pulled into a hug by the brunette. While trapped in Thea's clenched fist, Oliver was glad he'd been moved, as otherwise he'd have been smothered under Felicity and Thea's combined boobage from the rather tight and squishy hug they were giving, Oliver glad the hand that made it's way to cup Felicity's butt had been the one he wasn't in.

'So, I'm guessing you're Ollie's contact in his Hood duties?' Thea asks after finally letting go of the blond

'Yep, though why he told you I'll never know'

'He has a small problem, and needed some help getting to you' she teases, placing Oliver on the table directly in front of Felicity 'It dd take letting me join the team to convince me to come, though mentioning you'd be here could have helped' she winks and Felicity blushes

'Ssssoo, what happened?' she asks, both Queens explaining what little they knew, the techie frowning at the lack of useful information

Well, this is going to be difficult' the mutters

'But you can fix it right?' Oliver asks

'I think so, it'll probably require hacking Palmer Tech and Mercury Labs for any miniaturisation research but we should be fine... in a month or so'

'A MONTH! What am I supposed to do for a month at this size?'

'Keep in shape, train Thea, offer yourself up to Laurel as an apology and hope she doesn't smush you like the bug you appear to be' Felicity offers as suggestions, not really sure herself on their timeframe, though wasn't going to mention it to Oliver given his reaction to the month.

So what next?

1) Oliver is examined by Felicity, trying to find something that could help with changing him back to his original size
2) With nothing better to do Oliver has Thea badgering him into training her, working her through: archery, precision, strength training, flexibility, reflexes, etc some of which he was actually able to assist with (her reflexes and accuracy were improved trying to catch him to example) while others he was about as much help at his size as an instructor as an insole (something that came to mind for Thea during one time when his yelling was very unhelpful.

She takes advantage of the situation to make Felicity her's!
1121131.content:
After Ray's untimely demise in a fiery explosion Palmer Tech was left to Felicity, who during a lull in the insanity that came with being tech support for The Arrow (the joking title for her job, as Oliver has refused to give her a codename yet) decided to have a proper look at what remained of Ray's A.T.O.M. suit. The coding was simple for her, though the exact specifics were unfamiliar as Ray hadn't really explained what he had planned for his suit to be doing.

Picking up a piece of the arm guard she weights it in her hand 'What do you do?' she mutters tiredly, before setting it down and continuing to work through the system 'Hm, A.T.O.M. beam? Did Ray actually get some of this suit finished before he died?' Felicity asks herself, nudging the enter key with her pinkie and getting a bolt of seep blue energy right in the chest, tossing her back and causing her to hit the wall.

She comes to a little while later with a headache and a chill 'Ah, Ray if you weren't dead I'd... try and fail to kick your ass' she gives up trying to rant midway through and just sighs, only then did she realise something else was wrong (I blame head trauma for her slow reaction time). She was nude, practically buried under the blue dress she'd been wearing when she had last been conscious; Ray's beam had shrunk her... and only her, not even her glasses had shrunk with her (though she guesses that if she'd been wearing contacts she THEY would have, mostly because she didn't like to imagine her eyes exploding). Peaking her head out of the cloth of her dress and giving her surroundings a once over the blond guessed she was about 3-4 inches tall, not that big but workable, sort of. She was just glad she had all Ray's stuff brought to her office/lab, as otherwise she'd have been found by someone and most likely used as a test subject by now, the thought of being poked and prodded like she wasn't a person made her shudder, even if something about the current situation excited her. She just needed to get to her phone, which just typical for her was on the desk rather than on her person and therefore now on the floor because that would have been useful, and call Oliver, or maybe Laurel as she had a better grasp on subtlety, plus no offence to Oliver but Laurel seemed gentler, something her small body might just need.

Her plans fell apart the moment she heard yelling of her name, shortly followed by a brunette entering her office without knocking. Standing in her office, her current size looking more majestic than Venus or Artemis, was Thea Queen, aka Speedy, aka Oliver's sister, as well as another person who if they weren't all on the same crime fighting team Felicity was sure was too hot to admit she even knew her. While this made her plan to get her phone pointless it gave her a new and possibly better plan of getting Thea's attention. Sure her current situation meant she wasn't going to be running up to the younger Queen, as while her training/torture with Sara toned her a little it was nothing compared to Oliver, Sara, Nyssa or even Thea, plus the self conscious nerd inside her never went away and did we not just do a Greek Goddess comparison near the start of this paragraph. No instead she had to scream and yell while waving her arms, hoping Thea situational awareness was acute enough to pick up her small movements, or at least notice her dress in a messy clump right where she shrunk out of it.

'THEA! THEA I'M DOWN HERE!' the blond techie screams as Thea passes her by, stopping only to pick up her phone (there goes that option) and turn to leave when her foot catches one of Felicity's discarded/lost heels, which in turn drew her attention to the dress and the shrunken Felicity partly hidden within

'What the?' she mutters before moving to investigate, the speed causing Felicity to speak in fear and shut her eyes tight 'Felicity! Is that you?' she feels Thea's warm breath on her skin as she opens her eyes, the girl leaning over her filling her entire field of vision

The blond nods 'Yeah Thea, it's me'

'Holy shit, how'd this happen?'

'I was working on Ray's old suit, the thing has a shrink ray built into the glove. Guess that's one of the reasons it's called the ATOM suit. I really need your help Thea, there is no way I'm going to be able to fix myself alone, will you help?'

Options:

1) Thea is happy to assist however she can, such as packing up Ray's suit parts and Felicity's clothes (as well as the blond herself), and brining everything to the Arrow Cave so they can be worked on privately. Whether everything reaches the lair intact and unbroken is up to the writer
2) Thea's had a crush of Felicity for a few years now, but the blond has always been pining for Oliver to the brunette's annoyance. But here it is, a chance for Thea to prove herself, show Felicity she's the better Queen to be the girlfriend of. And if that doesn't work, she's sure Felicity's cute little tush would be better served at her current size as her love pet. And she would be a kind and fair mistress, just like when she accidentally walked in on Sara with a shrunken Nyssa curled up in the younger Lance's deep cleavage.

11221.content:
Thea sighs deeply as she lounges on her sofa, not really having much to do with her nights due to her temporary retirement from the position as Speedy, though she did still feel it was needed or she'd go insane or at least as paranoid as Oliver had these past few years. Just as she was considering what reruns to watch a flash of light flooded her loft, leaving the former vigilante dazed and blinking back stars

"Lena didn't mention pain, maybe that was intentional" a small, high pitched voice sounds behind her, perking Thea's senses and causing her to peer behind the couch, eyes nearly falling out of her sockets when she see's a teeny Supergirl, maybe 4 inches tall, trying to gain her bearings and clearly failing.

Context/previously/on Earth 38

"Thanks for doing this for me Supergirl" Lena grins as she calibrates the teleport for it's first live fire test

"No worries, I'm just glad you let me in on the secret rather than blinding trust Rhea, the woman's a manipulative bitch" Kara says, not bothered censoring her feelings for the Daxamite Queen

"Yes, several mental alarm bells were set off during my interactions, most likely because she reminded me a lot of mother. Anyway this device should be able to teleport someone across the planet in an instant, and if it works there possibilities are practically limitless. We just need to make sure it's safe for human testing"

"So you're sending something much more sturdy than a human first?" Supergirl teases, then raises a hand when she see's Lena about to try backtrack her statements "I'm kidding, I practically volunteered, and it's probably safer for me than Kara Danvers don't yeah think?" she grins and Lena laughs, knowing her friend would want to try out something this new and crazy given half the chance.

"All systems running smoothly, you just need to walk into the light once the portal opens" Lena explains, Supergirl nods to show she understands and once the ball of energy forms she jumps into it, a kaleidoscope of colours buffeting her senses before landing flat on her face in a heap.

"Ow, Lena didn't mention pain, maybe it was intentional" Kara groans as she picks herself up, her idled mind not quite being able to process anything until there was a tight grip around her waist and she was shot up into the air

"Holy shit, Kara it really is you!"

"Thea! Thank Rao, I was worried there for a moment. Um, did you see where the portal I exited from is?"

"Nope, it just sort of spat you out and sealed itself up" Thea says with a shrug "Guess you're stuck with me then" she grins widely

"That's won't be necessary, you can just bring me to Oliver or Team Flash and it will all be on it's way"

Thea hums "What if I don't want to?"

"Excuse me?"

"I kind of like the fact I have a Supergirl that fits in my hand, a toy for my own amusement"

Kara frowns "Now you listen her Miss Queen, you wil....ah" Kara screams as Thea increases the pressure on her ribs

"You're being a disobedient toy there Kara, I guess all I can do is punish you for misbehaving" Thea pouts, pinching Kara's butt as she does, mostly to get the blond to yelp cutely

What does the youngest Queen have in mind?

1) She puts Kara in one of her sneakers and goes for a late night jog around the neighbourhood, it's not like anything out there could hurt the former Speedy, and it shows Kara her place in this world now she's tiny, as well as who her mistress is
2) Deciding to continue her original plan to binge watch some stuff on TV she slips Kara down the back of her pants, loving her squirming as she sits back down and relaxes into the seat, grinding her ass onto Kara as she does so
3) It has been a long day and Thea's tired, so in the end she puts Kara in her bra and goes to sleep, sleeping on her front to deter little blond aliens from escaping

14122111.content:
It's late, and Caitlin realized she has spent too much time working at Star Labs and talking with KF. Since they are able to communicate to each other, Caitlin had a lot of things to asks, and this night helped her to get some answers, and to get fun somehow at the same time.

"Are you seriously get to sleep now like a granny ? Come on let's get some fun in a Night Club or something The voice of KF said.

" hmmm...maybe another day. Beside, i know what you have in mind. You want me to find a man, but even if i wanted to get one, i can't imagine the crazy relationship with you always with me " Caitlin replied while taking her handbag and her cloak.

" We'll find a way to separate us. It's only a matter of time "

" Yeah, but for now let's just go...." Caitlin was about to open the door's lab, when she heard something falling on the ground. "..wait what was that ? "

" Let me have the control. It's probably nothing, be we have to be sure it's not a Meta. " Killer Frost asked.

" Ok, but if there's nothing, promise me we're not going anywhere else than home "

" pfff...you're not funny. Trust me "

Killer Frost then took the control of the women's body, the whole atmostphere getting cold now. She walked carefully throught the lab, checking on the ground and found a strange book near the desk.

" What's that ? "

" Seems like a...book. But i never seen a book like this in Star labs " Caitlin replied. KF picked it up and checked the cover, when she heard a voice in her head that was not Caitlin.

"I've traveled far to this place and time to lay this precious burden at your feet. Use this book to reshape the world as you see fit. Show them what a real god can do

" Hey who's that, there's not enought place for a third personn in our head ! " KF joked, but also checked that no Meta Human was around messing with her.

" I heard him too. Maybe we should contact Cisco and the Team. I don't know what's going on, but this book seems dangerous " Caitlin stated, while her alter ego seemed more and more interested by the Book and the words they just heard.

" Come on Cait, what if it was true ? Maybe we can use the Book to reshape the world, which mean a lot but also we can...separate each other ! "

" But...you don't even know how this work ! And what if this was a trap ? Let me be in charge, i'll contact the team ! "

_____________________________

Note : In the first two options Caitlin and Frost are separated in a new reality, and one of them is shrunk to 4 inches tall, as mentionned previously.

Option 3 and 4 are free for the size changing (growing, shrinking, etc)
14122111.title: Caitlin Snow and the Book of Destiny

141221111.content:
"No way am I passing up the chance to finally meet you face to face Caity" Frost growls grabbing the Book and ignoring her other halfs protests as well as attempts to put herself back in the driver's seat. Pulling open the book she lets the energy flow into her, bending to her will "Time to come out Caity, I'm waiting" her voice hums as an energy pulse shoots from herself and the book, reverberating through Earth one as it works it's power into the fabric of this reality.

Frost stands there, the book now inert at least for the moment, and nothing, still not Caitlin Snow "This book is bullshit" she yells, tossing the artefact across the room, turning to leave she stops when the hears a high pitched squeak 'The fuck' Frost looks down and her eyes bulge: there at her feet was a tiny Caitlin Snow, about the size of her hand and completely nude (guess the book made her a body but forgot to give her clothes) "Well what do we have here?" she purrs, reaching down and grabbing her tiny counterpart, her warm body strangely nice in her cold grip

"Frost, you need to fix this, I can't just this small" Caitlin squeaks fearfully, though Frost finds it kind of cute, petting her hair and watching ice crystals form harmlessly

"Not likely, if this is how we can be separate then tough titties, even your itty bitty titties" she chuckles as she sits down to properly examine her other half.

What does she decide to do?

1) Not in the mood to tell the others about her freedom just yet, she puts Caitlin in her shoe and goes out for a little fun, knowing that as they're the same person Caitlin won't die or even really be that discomforted under her ice cold soles
2) Frost decides Caitlin has played it safe for too long, and how better to cut loose than being the toy to an adventurous and sex starved giantess
3) It seems Frost did more than just separate them, opening Caitlin's wallet she finds her own face listed as Crystal Snow, and checking records finds out they were now twins, Caitlin having been born this small and Crystal being the protective big sister, though that hasn't stopped her trying to get both of them laid flirting with Nora of all people, the security video amusing Frost and mortifying Caitlin.

1412211111.content:
" Ok. Now let's think about the options we have now. " Frost said still petting her captive. She then looked at the book with her cold blue eyes. " This book is just amazing. I probably can do whatever i want, all my wishes can become true...". Her attention now turned back to Caitlin who tried in vain to escape her fist.

" i'll make sure no one can get it. " Frost raised an hand and freeze and froze the book.

" There will be some consequences by using it ! " Caitlin said.

" Yeah, yeah, i'll think about that later, now let's focus on you, and on what i want to do. " Frost replied nonchalantly. " I think i want to drink and dance for the whole night ! "

" Guess you can, now that we don't share the same body anymore, but please be serious and don't leave me with that size !! " Caitlin begged.

" Oh no, you're going to spend the night with me. I think you need fun too, but...oh wait, not sure this going to be so much fun for you considering where you're going to be...."

" Wh...what do you have in mind ?! " the tiny woman began to worry.

" You're going to be in my shoes, maybe your tiny naked body will warm my sole up " The giantess giggled by seeing Caitlin's face turning pale. The small woman wanted to say something, but it was too late as Frost removed one of her shoe to drop her inside and put her giant cold foot back in.

" hmmmm..this feel so good " Frost said. She made sure to get Caitlin's face between her big and second toes, while her body was right under her sole. Caitlin thought she was going to be crushed, or frozen, but nothing happenned.

" Don't worry you will survive. This will be unpleasant, but for any other personn, this would be a cold hell. Consider yourself priviliged "

The small woman tried to punch her sole by instinct, making things more enjoyable for Frost who took the book, and left Star Lab to go....
1412211111.title: Warm insole for cold feet

14122111111.content:
Hiding the Book in cold storage, under a crap ton of ice may not have been the most elegant of solutions/hiding places, but it worked remarkably well, the same could in fact be said for her current method of containing her lessor half: some would call it torture, Hell it would be torture for anyone besides Caitlin, but just as she had intended there was no way the little lady was getting out from under her feet anytime soon, though she was a little disappointed that Caity gave up pounding in her toes after only 10 minutes, that felt like some kind of strange massage, and was nice.

Her plans to have a little fun were assisted by the fact Caitlin was always very well dressed, the cryokinetic only needing to swap out her lab coat for her blue badass coat then head for the nearest nightclub to start a boozing.

Her meta powers, much like Barry had an adverse effect on her level of intoxication, in that she couldn't get there, it wasn't like Barry zooming through it, it was more like the bar was so high thanks to her power she would never reach it. That personal challenge was the reason after one small fruity drink ordered for her by a cute looking guy she felt was punching well about his weight, she went straight for the hard liquor. This meant she formed a slight rhythm of drink dance, drink, dance, she didn't care who or what or whether her partner had a cock or a nice set of tits, anyone who caught her eye.

Case in point being the lovely lady drinking alone at the bar, from the way they eyed her they recognised her from somewhere just no clue where, and Frosty was intrigued so slid into the seat right next to them "This place seems a little run down for someone like you" she purrs, getting a clearly unamused expression in response.

"Maybe I prefer not to be disturbed" the replies, causing Frost to chuckle

"Dance with me" she orders, surprising the woman

"Excuse..."

"We're dancing, best you is at least try to leave intact tonight" she whispers in her eats and that shiver of fear, whoever they were did recognise her "Come on cut loose" she yells, dragging her into the middle of the club, seeing the shock and joy on their face then she realises despite how much alcohol Frost had knocked back she was still very graceful and flirty, managing to find an opening to build upon.

About an hour later

"Come on with me to my place, we can have a proper good time" Frost coos, happy her soon to be lover was a giddy drunk as they were the most fun even when kicking them out back when she worked for Amienate, mostly because they were grinning and joking even when being thrown out. Resting her face in the crook of Frosts neck, they were content to follow the ice meta as she let the girl in and both were quick to start stripping one another, coming just shy or ripping them off each other

Things were much less peachy for Caitlin though, for one she learnt that Killer Frost did sweat, just that her cryokinetic powers flash froze the water and created a layer of ice on her skin during nights like this. The problem came when it started to affect her, her body pinned rather comfortably through the ice to Frost's toes, which only let her free when they felt her frozen form and gave it a pinch or a squeeze hoping for a response from the little critter in her shoe. And now they were fucking on her bed, damn it Frost!

The next morning

It was actually a relief to learn that Frost's powers essentially died when she was unconscious as the moment she fell asleep cupping the breasts of the woman she'd just screwed, with their legs intertwined. With the ice now weaker Caitlin was able to full herself free of the bindings and slip away, the warmth under the covers helping that extremely.

It was a simple plan ,sneak over to her phone, send a message explaining the situation and then let the others deal with Frosty once more. But still there was a woman in her bed she'd never met before.

Getting out from under the stifling covers was a train wreck, but finally besides Frost shifting slightly, worrying Cait that she was going to spend the rest of the night crushed under her ass but she mad it to the back of Frost's neck, even now she was curious as to who her double tricked into following her into bed.... She gasped when she realised the person was:

Patty Spivott
Thea Queen
Nora West-Allen

141221112.content:
"No way am I passing up the chance to finally meet you face to face Caity" Frost growls grabbing the Book and ignoring her other halfs protests as well as attempts to put herself back in the driver's seat. Pulling open the book she lets the energy flow into her, bending to her will "Time to come out Caity, I'm waiting" her voice hums as an energy pulse shoots from herself and the book, reverberating through Earth one as it works it's power into the fabric of this reality.

"Ow, what hit me" Frost whines as she sits up, blnking the stars out of her vision

"It would seem there is an unexpected side effect to your messing with a dangerous artefact" the cryo turns her head and her eyes bulge seeing a smiling Caitlin with her head resting on her arms, the problem being her hands were larger than Frost's entire body

"I..."

"It would seem that because you were essentially added onto me you don't get to have a body the same as mine, well not on the same scale at least" Caitlin explains putting on her nerd face "As for your state of undress, guess you forgot to wish for clothes" she chuckles as Frost finally notices she isn't wearing a stich of clothing

"Well don't just stand there, fix me!" she demands, Caitlin pout before standing up properly, then grabbing Frost in hr fist

"You don't seem to understand your new position, you're teeny and I'm in charge, you might want to get used to that"

Frost growls "Like Hell, I am stronger!" she screams, her powers flowing from her... and were less than spectacular

"From a killer from to a living ice cube" Caitlin teases "I don't know if it's your new size, the fact we're one and the same or a combination of the 2, but I barely feel a thing" she smirks before pressing the former villain against her breast, Frost gulping when a nipple about half her size starts to push against her "See, ice cube, and I don't take orders from something I regularly crunch without even a thought" Caitlin says, driving home a very important lesson for Frosty, that Caitlin holds ALL the power right now, all she can do is survive it

What happens now?

1) Once she gets home Caitlin kicks off her shoes and drops Frost between them, using her as a cold compress to sooth the aching feet, to the smaller girls disapproval
2) Feeling her counterpart deserves it Caitlin drops her into her drink as an actual living ice cube and heads back to the computer, sipping slowly and ignoring/savouring the woman's demands and latter pleads not t be eaten by what had previously been her weaker side

141221112.title: Backfired

141221113.content:
Frost frowns but agrees with her other half "Fine, be boring as usual. I'm tagging out, don't do anything fun without me" the cryokinetic grumbles before relinquishing control back to Caitlin, her breath coming out in a mist as the room stabilises itself once more then reaching for her phone.

Trying to explain to the team that a book appeared in the lab and spoke to her... actually didn't even make the top 5 of crazy shit that has happened to this team, but it was the weirdest this month. Getting responses from everyone she had little to do other than stand around while they waited for the rest of Team Flash to come to them.

"Why don't you open the book?" Frost asks, her short attention span already flash frozen due to the lack of meta attacks this week, but having something like that book, sitting within arms reach and just leaving it alone clearly annoyed her

"We don't know what it does, or how it works" Caitlin replies, oddly enough feeling her other side roll her mental eyes at her

"And that will stay that way unless we do something. For all you know there's an instruction manual in the front of the book, the weird voice said we could shape the world or some shit, there's no way someone is dumb enough to hand power like that out without at least an owners manual"

Caitlin sighs, but she also see's Frost's point, this was GIVEN to them, not simply a fluke like what powers people got when the particle accelerator exploded, there was a will and reason behind the action, Plus curiosity was a trait both her and Frost shared and she was itching to give the book a peek

"Okay fine, but if this goes badly I'm blaming you" Caitlin finally concedes, ignoring the mental smug grin Frost was sporting as she runs her fingers along the leather bound book, opening the front page she was blinded by white light, an 'oh fuck' passes her lips before it's power began to flow and overwhelm the biologist

What happens now?

1) While never her name, Frost was created with the goddess Khione in mind, meaning the book fulfilled that idea, Caitlin coming to in the wreckage of STAR labs, lying on the stomach of an amused, enormous and separate Killer Frost, eager to have a little fun with the tiny city, as well as tiny Caitlin.
2) Caitlin tosses the book but the light and power wash over the rest of the team as they enter at that very moment, shrinking them to 5 inches tall, leaving a major problem to be dealt with as quickly as possible
3) Caitlin finds herself a little stuck as she has filled a good portion of the cortex when the book made her a giant (Solving a subconscious desire to be powerful herself rather than a vessel for Killer Frost), as well as the oddly pleasant chill from a 3 foot tall Killer Frost pinned under her now massive butt cheeks. For now they have to made do with their rather uncomfortable positions while they once again wait for the others to get to STAR labs and deal with this mess (Now if only one of them knew where the book went)

Nora missed the mayhem that was Joh Deegan messing with reality, which was why when she came across a strange book that wasn't mentioned anywhere she was instantly curious. The moment her hand touched the book a voice rumbles through her mind

'This book has the power to shape reality, show the world the true power of a God'

Nora's eyes widen and a grin spreads across her face, if it really could do what it teased she could use it to fix her mistakes, deal with Cicada, save her dad, maybe even make sure her mom never gets her chipped and she can have her powers her whole life. So many possibilities, and all of them available to her.

2) Given her still burning rage towards Iris (buried but nor extinguished) she has a much more fun plan: a few years after Nora is born Iris contracts a shrinking disease, so by the time Nora enters her late teens her 'mother' is little more than a toy. Patty frowned at what was basically a light up book, hoped she hadn't unleashed some kind of demon or super virus and looked up to the clock 'Shit, I'm going to be late' she thinks, ditching the paperwork and swiftly driving home, changing into the nice dress she'd picked for this evening: she was meeting up with Barry for a nice dinner between friends, Iris had already dug her claws in so she had to make do with friendship and even though she was a little mad about his secret keeping Barry was too adorably innocent for her to truly take out on him.

Getting to the restaurant Patty is lead to a table that seemed empty, frowning as she didn't know what she had expected, Barry was late for everything after al...

Patty hummed in confusion as she sat down to order food... then hwe eyes widen in her sockets when she see's what's already on the table.

A 5 inch, Barry Allen in the cutest suit she'd ever seen

"Barry!" she squeaks, then blushes a little at her reaction "You're so little"

At this Barry is the one to turn red "Patty, I get made fun of enough for what happened, I don't need my girlfriend doing the same" he whines

'girlfriend!' Patty thinks as she gets a migraine from the book editing her memory to the new present: Things were normal until the particle accelerator then while Barry was in his coma his meta ability kicked in, making him really small and really durable, gave Caitlin the shock of the year when she walked in to what appeared to be an empty bed. He wasn't married to Iris in this world, they tried but she couldn't handle the looks at her toy sized boyfriend so they broke it off, not helped by her casual crushing of him by sitting or standing on him randomly, even once accidentally using him as an insole for 3 days. As for them, they hit it off the moment she walked into his lab, then his heart, they started dating about a month after she joined the CCPD, have been going strong ever since and even moved in together, technically she brought him home in her purse one night and he has stayed ever since. All in all it was a much better world in her eyes than she was in an hour ago, her hatred of metas even simmering, now it was more complaining they were making her adorable meta boyfriend look like a thug, Barry not minding listening to her vent as she tended to cuddle him during these moments, happy to get held against her chest, only a thin blouse between him and boobs bigger than he is.

"Yeah, sorry I didn't help with the paperwork, Singh made it official the moment you joined the lab that I was to never file a report again as he can't read anything I write at this size" Barry apologies, but Patty just giggles

They actually do have a nice meal and were just elavign when they get a call stating there was another meta attack they needed to be there for...

1412212.content:
Here's some ideas to start with, but it can be something else as long as you leave the option open :

- Sara Lance : Sounds like something she can uses intentionnally or not with Ava and/or Nyssa. One of them can be the victim, or we can stay with Oliver, Barry, etc

- Ava Sharpe : Being a clone is not easy to live with, Ava uses a strange Book to change this...and maybe some other little things

- Gideon ?? : What about having the AI tempted to use the book the crew found, to get a real body...and maybe some other things funny ?
1412212.title: A character from LOT

14122121.content:
After the madness that had been them dealing with Deegan and the Book of Destiny, the combined Flash and Arrow crews wanted the magical artefact dealt with as swiftly and quietly as possible, calling in the Legends as that was now part of their job description (Time and Magic), forgetting they would be giving the Book to someone who would want to use it just as much if not more than their previous adversary.

Sara hyperventilating as she slips into her cabin and locks the door. She'd given up this power once, and now it's fallen into her hands she's not letting it slip by again. She couldn't use the Spear, not with Thawne gunning for them, but here and now there was no threat, no one trying to kill her, she could make her wish come true. Plus this was a hell of a lot easier to use than the last reality bender she had held, only needing to be opened, rather than some Latin phrase from hat she could tell. With a though at the forefront of her mind Sara opens the book, ready to bring the world under her heel

What now?

1) Sara does what she's wanted to do since finding out about her death: bring back Laurel. The problem is the unexpected side effect, that being one of the Lance sisters is now a little person, completely dependant on the other for survival. Certain things no longer happen while others continue as normal., such as if Sara is the normal one her and Laurel are on the Waverider, where as if Sara is small Laurel is the original Canary... in fact she's the one and only.
2) Oliver informed Sara of Nyssa's death on the island and it had been eating at her since then Now she can fix everything, make it so Nyssa joined the ship alongside her. The problem came on a much later mission where one of them gets caught in a shockwave given off by one of Ray's gadgets, leading to some size related mayhem (aka Nyssa or Sara are now either a giantess or the size of a doll, it can't be fixed and they're learning to work around it)
14122121.title: Sara lance and the Book of Destiny

141221212.content:
'Hey Ollie' Sara greets as she enters the Lair 'What's so important you had me come down form the ship to meet?' she asks with a smile, until she see's Oliver's pained expression 'Ollie'

'Sara, this isn't something you should hear anyway other than face to face. I called in Nyssa to help me save everyone when Chase took them and both you and Barry were indisposed. I'm sorry to tell you, she didn't make it'

Sara's expression falls 'No, Oliver don't mess with me this is Nyssa we're talking about' she pleads, after Laurel she can't lose another, especially not the woman who still held her heart after all this time

Oliver pulls her into a hug, partly so she doesn't collapse she assumes "I'm sorry, even more so as it looked like she'd been stabbed in the back, though given what happened on the island we're unlikely to know the full story' he explains, the wails coming from the blond not being heard since he'd been forced to tell her about Laurel's death, much like this moment actually

Sara crushes the memory, burying it deep. She needed to focus on her target and goal, but the memory itself would do nothing more than upset her, she was trying to bring her beloved back, as well as stop her ever being in a position like this in the first place.

She saw it all as reality was being altered, ignoring Nyssa's request to leave her, Rip flashing his way through Nanda Parbat for them both as well as flashing Nyssa so Sara could carry her onto the Waverider.

Her mind was drawn to another memory, Nyssa following her as they went to check in on Ray, who had been working on his matter reduction, compression device... aka the shrink ray, when it shorted out, releasing an energy pulse that threw them all to the ground.

What happened?

1) Nyssa had grown, filling up a good portion of the available space in the lab, Sara nearly being crushed under her toned ass cheeks

2) Given the device it's little wonder Nyssa shrunk to the size of a doll. This is good for stealth, not so much combat, also she has a free ride off any and all female teammate, even the minorly endowed Zari

3)Same a 2, but it's Sara who ended up shrinking. Nyssa eventually becoming the captain, with Sara being her advisor/pet, not that the blond was in any mood to complain.
141221212.title: Nyssara size play

14122122.content:
As the current head of magical containment throughout time, Ava Sharpe was informed of a book that warped reality rather quickly, how they managed to acquire it without nearly blowing up the world she neither knows nor cares, but Sara and her team are actually getting good at dealing with magical dodads, much as she loathes to admit it given how causal and more importantly chaotic they are.

Still, as she looks at the Book, which looked old and ornate with a palatable aura of power coming from it Ava can't help but wonder what she could do with it: So many problems solved in an instant, calamities foiled before they could even begin, her own origins....

It was actually the first thing that came to mind when she heard about the book's power: she had accepted her status as a clone a while ago, she didn't like it but there was nothing she could do to change that. With the opportunity to do just that it seems she wasn't quite as accepted as she told herself.

As director nobody questions her entering any of the rooms, even ones containing magical artefacts. Deactivating the containment seals Ava runs her hands along the leather then pulls the book open, the lighting blinding her as it floods the chamber

What does she do?

1) The book makes it so she's no longer a clone, but does it by making her a living doll, then teleporting her into the Captain's quarters of the Waverider, just before Sara heads for a shower
2) Due to her non-human status the books power is absorbed into Ava's body, making her a magical being capable to tearing apart and reconstructing reality with a wave of her hand. Oh what fun she could do with this power, now to find her first test subject...
14122122.title: Ava Sharpe and the Book of Destiny

14122123.content:
After all the mayhem caused by the book the teams wanted to just lock it up and never hear from it again. Why in an attempt to do so they handed it to the Legends is a mystery even Batman can't solve. Sara happily accepted the book and put it where it should most appropriately stay: the library. She also had Gideon create a genetic lock to attach to the front, stopping Mick and Zari (the most likely to use the book for their own ends) from even touching it without receiving a cattle prod to the brain.

Having dealt with the human element, Sara forgot about the mechanical crew member, mostly because she was the ship itself. Gideon smiles from her virtual zone, the self aware AI curious as to whether she could even use it, as while it worked for humans it also clearly took a lot of control, of which she lacked the former and had the latter in cargo holds. Finally as is common on this crew her curiosity lead to her doing something ill advised. Fabricating probes and manipulators she sets up an apparatus so she can open the book and then absorb/direct the energy in ways she decides. With the Book pretty much hooked up to the Core she has a pair of grabbers undo the genetic lock and then open the book proper, the light flooding the room and energy flowing through the wires into Gideon.

What happens?

1) Gideon absorbs the book itself into her system, giving her absolute control of reality within the Waverider, which was basically her body up to this point and now is so much more. Summoning an avatar through which to interact she leaves the library and sets off in search of her crew, her little playmates inside her domain.
2) Her desire to be physical/have a real body is fulfilled in a round about way, as she steps out of the books pages... 6 inches tall and naked. Looks like she's going to need a little help getting things fixed, maybe Zari, she knows how to keep a secret and likes tinkering with things as well as loopholes, which should help her keep her human form while also making it the size of a normal human
14122123.title: Gideon messing with the crew

14122124.content:
Zari: As the loophole Queen (or at least that's what I call her) Zari sees the Book of Destiny as a way to make her own changes to history without having to worry about delicate alterations or the messy consequences. If only she knew the Book also had consequences for it's use too ;)

Charlie/the shapeshifter (in case I misremembered her name): The moment the Book arrives on the Waverider Charlie sees it as a quick and easy way to get her powers back, as well as make things better for her, maybe get some other cool powers: Size change, invulnerability, actual immortality, whatever she likes. Of course this could all go wrong, but who knows?
14122124.title: Someone else

choices: Thea Queen and the Book of Destiny
Evil Laurel and the Book of Destiny
Felicity and the Book of Destiny
1412213.content:
Here's some ideas to start with, but it can be something else as long as you leave the option open :

- Thea Queen : She finds a book who can gives her anything she wants, bringing back her mother on the way, and more ! Only thing is that it affects Oliver, or someone else in a stange way

- Evil Laurel : What kind of fun she can have with that book ?

- Felicity Smoak : An accident happen in the reality when she tries to figure out what the book is.
1412213.title: A character from Arrow

14122131.content:
Thea groans as she steps back into her apartment, her vacation was nice but now back to work. Even with Oliver now out of prison there was a lot of crap that needed doing and she was unfortunately not the kind of person to just ignore the world burning around her... anymore that is.

Her newer sense of awareness was why she noticed the very old and very strange looking book sitting on her desk, not having any idea why anyone would leave something like that for her, especially with as said before Oliver having been behind bars until very recently and her dad dead, so her suspicions were peaking. Frowning and considering the possible reasons for such an object to wind up in her possession, Thea decides to do what she did best, blinding charging in. With that she picks up the book and immediately a booming voice in her head is heard

"I've travelled far to this place and time to lay this precious burden at your feet. Use this book to reshape the world as you see fit. Show them what a real god can do"

"Okay, that hurt and was weird" Thea complains to herself, while trying to process what she'd just learnt. Someone/something had left her a gift: a book which could apparently rewrite reality itself. They really had no idea who they were fucking with did they? Giggling slightly evilly Thea sits herself down on the bed and wonders what she could change, how to make things better for her family?

She opens the book and lets the light/power flow into her, but what happens to the world?

1) None of the Arrow stuff happened in Thea's new world, no Undertaking and no sinking of the Queen's Gambit, as she knows everything else is tied back to those 2 moments in one way or the other. The side effect is that Oliver was born small and currently lives at exactly 5 inches tall, which means that for the last 6 or so years she's been his guardian/keeper, though she's had that role since she was young and enjoyed messing around with her big little brother in the ways expected of bratty rich kids.
2) She erases their mother's death, but oddly enough the domino effect is her own size. Malcolm had things done to him when he was still part of the league, they didn't seem to work on him, but were passed onto his daughter, when time catches up with itself Thea is 50ft tall, and boy is she looking forward to having fun with HER city.
14122131.title: Thea Queen and the Book of Destiny

141221311.content: From what Thea could see, nothing has really changed in her apartment. At least until she heard some noises coming from a box, which she came to check and open it. To her surprise, Oliver was in there....so tiny and so helpless. But...is he aware of the new reality, or is he unaware ?
141221311.title: My brother's keeper

1412213111.content:
" Thea ?! What's going on ?! And why am i so tiny ?! " Oliver asks from the box.

Thea remains speechless for a moment, realizing that the book said the truth. " Huh...sorry Ollie, but i can't help. You were born like this, remember ? What's wrong with you ? " Thea lies, and playing the game of the story created by the new reality.

" But...this is nonsense ! " Oliver replies not knowing what was happenning. " And what's the book you're holding ? "

" hmmm? Nothing to worry about. But don't worry Ollie, you'll remember soon " Thea was about to open the book, when someone rang the door. Thea put the book on the table, and went to open the door, it was...

1) Moira Queen, who wants to know how's her tiny son

2) Laurel Lance, who likes toying with him sometimes
1412213111.title: Aware

choices: Both Queens need a drink right now
14122131111.content:
Thea stops and stares at the blond woman standing in the doorway of her apartment, sure on an intellectual level she knew this would happen, no Arrow stuff no Slade killing their mom, but to see her there in front of her after all this time, she wasn't emotionally ready.

"Thea darling are you okay?" Moira asks, looking concerned as her daughter's eyes begin to tear up "Did something happen?"

Thea sniffles and pulls her into an embrace "Everything's fine mom, I just missed you more than I thought" she mumbles, but the older woman smiles and holds her close

"Don't apologise dear, I feel the same too sometimes, it's weird not having you or Oliver in the house anymore. Which brings me to why I'm here, how are my babies?"

Thea smiles, composing herself a little more "We're fine mom, Ollie's a little grumpy but that's normal" she says, stepping out of the way to let her mother in

Moira rolls her eyes "Was it one of the Lance girls? He's so hopelessly smitten with Laurel she can do anything to him, and Sara is the living embodiment of chaos"

Thea shrugs "Don't think so, maybe he's just in one of those moods" she leads the way into the bedroom, where Oliver was still waiting in his box

"Thea, explain what you were doing...." he begins but Thea loudly interrupts him

"Ollie, look who stopped by to visit" she announces with flare and enthusiasm, mostly because she knew unlike her that he had NO CLUE this was going to happen

"Mom" Oliver squeaks, then so quickly Thea worried she'd made their mom a speedster he was in her arms and cradled to her chest

"Oh my sweet boy, how have you been?" Moira asks, smiling at the pleasant warmth of her eldest, though also smallest child

Unsure how to react to both his size and the reappearance of his previously dead mother Oliver decides to improvise "Oh you know, same old, just wish Thea would stop closing the lid on my box" Moira frowns at her daughter who glares slightly at Oliver, his small size hidden for the most part but Moira's chest

"It's for your own protection Ollie, I don't know if it's your size, but you're really adventurous and I don't want to accidentally stand on you, sit on you and have you fall into one of my shoes. Sure you'd survive the entire thing but that doesn't mean I want to subject my brother to my butt or my bare feet" she explains, a small part of her enjoying the gulp and look of fear he gives her as she wriggles her toes at him.

"Right, so besides Thea not explaining her attempt at safety protocol anything else happening?"

Thea waves her off with a grin "Nah, been bringing him with me into the shower since I was old enough to go alone, just cause we're both adults now doesn't change a thing" she watches Moira roll her eyes and Oliver turn beat red

"Well it's definitely Thea under all that maturity then" the blond smiles and pulls her close for a hug, Oliver ending up sandwiched between them.

What next?

1) Thea suggests Oliver stay with Moira for a while, giving her a chance to explore the new world she created (maybe find some familiar little people)
2) After Moira leaves Thea slips Oliver into her pocket and heads off to Verdant, still belonging to her despite the reality warping
14122131111.title: Moira Queen

14122131113.content:
1) Felicity Smoak, here to help familiarise Thea with all the tech she'll be working with when she takes over QC from her dad, nothing to do with her thinking Oliver is the most adorable thing in the world, how she wants to hug him and squeeze him and put him in her panties.... damn it even writing something related to Felicity leads to oversharing (damn you Overwatch!)

2) Sara Lance, Thea's bestie who wants to take her out for drinks to celebrate her return and introduce her to her girlfriend (partial towards Nyssa, but Ava is an option too) Oliver may try escape or figure out what the hell is going on while she's gone.

141221341.content:
Lyla was about to leave her office when something strange happenned: a book just landed on her desk. And thought she had seen many crazy things in her life, this one was probably the most weirdest one. Lyla decided to check it, reading on the cover " Book of Destiny" and on the first page : "Use this book to reshape the world as you see fit. Show them what a real god can do, Lyla "

" What's the hell ?! " Lyla thought about calling John to ask Oliver if he knows something about that book, as he knows Constantine. But a part of her wanted to read it to know by herself what it is about. What if this book was true ? Maybe she could fix some little things, like allowing her "erased" daughter to exist, but she had to remain professionnal.

Lyla then just took the book and went back to her home. On the way she had time to think about it, and thought there were nothing wrong to read it, so that's what she did when a light appear...
