141221341423.content: Lyla changes her mind and decides to shrink...
141221341423.title: Changes her mind and uses the shrinking device ...

141221342.content:
It's been weeks since Talia and Adrian joined their force to break Oliver. This was their last day on Lian Yu, they made a huge plan taking in consideration everything that Oliver would do, everything was ready. Talia knew she had no other choices but to work with Adrian, aka Simon Morrison, in despite the fact that she hated him. But they had a common goal, and for this, Talia was able to do everything for it.

But something happenned as soon a Adrian left the island...a book. It wa there on the ground by her feet, which she could swear it wasn't there a minute ago.

" Book of Destiny. That book holds the key to your transformation, Talia and all you have to do is open it. Use it wisely, Talia. The universe is in your hands."

From the League, Talia knew this book as a legend, she never thought it could be real. But here it was, now in her hands. She already knew how this work, and all she had to do was to open it to check if the Book was as it was said, and that's exactly what she did..

______________________________

1) Talia uses the book giving a new size to Oliver and his friends, with the will to play with a tiny Felicity (or Thea) in front of tiny Oliver. This is the most cruel thing she can do to Oliver.

2) Talia has the world submitted to her. Oliver and Adrian are shrunk in a box and she has a lot of plans for them.

3) Talia becomes a giantess, decides she doesn't need adrian anymore and kill him. Then she gets Oliver
141221342.title: Talia and the Book of Destiny

choices: Oliver and Talia, alone at last
1412213423.content:
Talia decides that actually warping reality on a large scale could be too messy for her plans, though she knew Adrian would do so in a heart beat, another reason she was glad to have this artefact all to herself. It lead to the first of 2 simple changes she had the book to for her, that being making her a giantess, peeking at about 50ft tall, able to be altered mentally (she wanted to be able to sneak when needed, and giantess are rarely able to do so). the 2nd was for Chase to be on the island with her once more, not for any sentimental reasons but simple because with these new powers her plans also changed and as such she wanted to ensure he didn't get in her way the most direct way she knew, eliminating him.

She watches the tiny man look around in confusion, amusing herself before reaching down and grabs him to lift to face height.

"Back already, did you miss me that much?" Talia teases, deciding if she was going to be a giantess she might as well enjoy herself, not just with Oliver but all her victims.

Chase stares for a moment before yelling "Talia? What the... how are you this huge? Why didn't you bring this up before it would make killing Queen so much easier"

Talia chuckles "True my dear it will, but gaining this size advantage has also made me realise something that is important to both of us, I don't need you anymore"

"W-w-what, you need me, how are we going to capture Queen with you like this?" he asks, trying to get out of what he knew would soon be a sticky situation

"Oh don't worry, I have my ways" she smiles before clenching her fist, enjoying his screams of pain as well as both the sound and feel of bones breaking. She then opens her hand to let him drop to the ground, groaning weekly a moment later. As an assassin she knew exactly what it took to kill someone, and as such knew how far she could go and have the target remain alive, Chase would never recover from the amount of damage she just did but he'd live... not so much after she raised her foot, her boot hovering over his immobile form. She thought she heard something akin to a plea for mercy, but it was quickly drowned out due to the crunch as his body exploded under her boot. Grinding her foot into the ground to make her former partner unrecognisable she then shrunk herself to a more reasonable 7ft (liking the idea of still being taller than almost everyone), wiping her boot off a nearby rock before signalling her own followers who brought the boat to the island and headed for China where she would then be taking a plane to Star City. Look out Oliver Talia Al Ghul is back and more powerful than ever.

What now?

1) She baits a trap for Oliver on the outskirts of the city, somewhere she can have some fun with Oliver, with little chance of being uncovered
2) She decides to fuck subtlety thanks to her powers and walks through the city at full size, catching the attention of everyone and either killing or capturing every member of Team Arrow she comes across rather easily
3) Similar to option 2, except when they see a giantess rampaging through the city Oliver decides they can't deal with this alone, so calls for help from Team Flash, the Legends and even Supergirl, in the hopes they can all deal with the threat
1412213423.title: Giantess Talia squash Adrian Chase

14122134233.content:
Talia decides to uses her new power to get a visit to Star City, no matter how innocents will die under her boots. Only mattered her own revenge on Oliver Queen. Keeping the book close to her, she used it to teleport herself to Star City in a giant size. Of course she could have use it to send Oliver in an eternal torment, but it was more interesting to do it by herself.
.
The ground shakes at Star City, and this was not unnoticed by anyone living in this town who lived in there. Some giants footsteps were the cause of it, and it didn't take long for the inhabitants to see a giant woman walking on the street and on some cars by the way.

___________________________


" Felicity what do we have ? " Oliver asks worried.

" You wouldn't believe me, but i guess i have to tell you anyway. We're like in the movie of the "attack of the 50ft woman", except that i'm not sure this giant woman is looking for her husband considering who she is " Felicity replies

" And who's that ? "

Felicty only shows a video on her monitor, revealing a giant Talia Al Ghul on a rampage in the city, Oliver's city.

" Talia...Felicity, tells the team to join me " Oliver tells to Felicity as he's already putting his suit on.

" In fact, i was sure you would say this, that's why i've sent Dinah and the other getting some help. " The blonde confesses.

"What did you do ? "

That's when a portal open inside the Arrow's headquarters, where Dinah, Rene and John comes out with...Kara."

" Oh thanks God you came in time " Felcity said, worried that Oliver was going to fight alone a giant woman.

" Yeah, yeah, man, you're not alone in this fight " Rene says.

" This is my story. She wants me so you're not involved in this. Kara please go home " Olivers says taking his bow.

" We all know how stubborn you can be Oliver, and you might be able to defeat all of us, Kara will be able to stop you if needed " Dinah says

" Is that a threat ? "

" It is Oliver." John starts. " And we don't have time to argues with you. So this is our last warning : stay there or Kara will put you down, maybe in one of Star labs's jail " John replies.

" Don't make me do that Ollie, please " Kara begs.

Oliver sighs. " So you're asking me to stay there, while all of you will fight against Talia ? "

" That's exactly what we're asking. But now can we focus on more important things ? I've called the legends and they're coming, but for now we have to act quickly because Talia seems to no show any mercy for any innocents in Star City " Felicty says showing her monitor to the other.

Talia was not squashing people purposely, she did it only when she had no other choices, like when some cops where trying to stop her. Oliver then just realized something strange on the screen : Talia was holding a book he never seen before.

" What do we know about this book ? " He asks

" hmmmm...nothing but we can easily suppose that's what caused her new size, so Kara will steal it " Felicity replies and Kara nods. At this moment, Barry appear suddenly. " Hey guys, so it seems you have some...huh big troubles ? "

"It seems so" Kara says. " let me handle this with Barry. I don't want to be arrogant, be he and i are the most powerfull guys of our team."

Oliver wanted so much to get into the fight with them, but he couldn't do anything and had to admit that himself needed some protections right now. "Ok guys, just be carefull, the legends will soon come to help you"

Everyone nods and left the HQ to Star City and meets the giant woman who was now holding a cop in her hand.

" Tell me where's Oliver Queen, and i'll get rid of him. The Green Arrow won't cause any mess in your city ever again " The woman says.

But then...A time travel ship appears from the sky, getting Talia's attention. It lands on the ground, and Sara, Ray and the other left the ship.

" hmmm...Ta-er al-Asfer ? " Talia can recognize a former member from the league. A betrayor. She gets more interested by the woman standing by her feet than the cop in her hand that she put on the roof of a building.

What happens ?

1) Team Arrow / Flash / Supergirl arrives too. Talia wants to catch Kara, as she's the most dangerous ennemy for her..But she's beautiful too. She uses the book to remove her power so she can keep her and leaves the town ignoring the other who are totally helpless anyway

2) Talia is more interested by Sara than Oliver now. She'll get her in a way or another. Talia also has plans for Nyssa, who's Sara's girlfriend. A lot of fun can happen
14122134233.title: Anual crossover... again.

141221342332.content:
'Ah crap' Sara thinks, as the giantess does resemble Nyssa's description of her sister, with the demented grin that seemed to be inherited by all Al Ghul's being all the conformation she needed (unless Nyssa and Talia had ANOTHER sister). The only compliment she can give the psycho is the cute kid she met in the past turned real sexy when she grew up "Talia?" she yells, the woman's widening smile practically a neon YES!!!! to the blond

"Ta-er al-Asfer, or perhaps it is Sara Lance once more" Talia purrs, sending shivers down the spine of the Legend's Captain "Quite and interesting one, joined the League 3 times, resurrected by the Lazarus Pit, and held the heart of the Heir, only to shatter it" Sara only reacts to the last one, dipping her head in shame and embarrassment "Lucky for you I wasn't close enough with my sister to want to break your tiny form for breaking her heart, instead I'll just take you"

Gulping Sara switches straight into Captain mode "Ray make this problem smaller, John, any problems with sending a more technical demon to Hell?" the Englishman shakes his head and starts chanting as Ray blasts Talia, who stands to shrink before shooting back up again

"That wasn't supposed to happen"

"Your tech is faulty Haircut" Mick complains, grumpy as he knows against Talia even his flamethrower was useless

"There's nothing wrong with the tech, it was supposed to make her 10% of her previous size, which I'd estimate would be about 5ft even" Ray defends

"Hey guys, ever consider she has actual control over her size?" the team look to the former shape shifter, currently wearing a previous teammates face "What, giants are just big, like how people are just their own size and sprites fit in your hand, it's people like me, and I guess her with control of their forms that are difficult to mess with the way Ray just did"

"Less taking more running!" Zari screams just as Talia tosses away the Waverider, wrecking a good portion of the neighbourhood and removing their biggest weapon from their reach

"Let's try this again Ta-er al-Asfer, I'm going to pick you up and you're not going to stop me, in exchange your team doesn't get to find out what their insides look like smeared on the sole of my boots look like nor do they find out what my insides look like when I devour them" the Legends shiver, knowing the woman meant business but didn't want to abandon their captain, luckily for them they didn't have to make the decision

"If I go with you will they be spared?" Sara asks, getting a half smile from Talia

"As long as they don't foolishly get underfoot, and don't try to follow me in an attempt at rescue then all will be fine" Talia promises, getting a nod from Sara

"Guys, go meet up with Team Arrow, then focus on helping fix the city" she waves off their complaints and arguments "No, we can't face this head on, all she wants is me so I'm taking one for the team, just like Rip taught us. This is an order now go"

While this was going on Talia notices something odd out the corner of her eye, looking up she saw a red streak heading in her direction, while something shot through the air faster than any manmade object 'Hmm, so these jokers aren't the only reinforcements Oliver sent for, too bad they're worthless against me' she smirks as just before the duo reach her she uses the book's power to vanish them in a poof of blue smoke, reappearing tiny and powerless back in the Arrow Cave.

Sara was more than happy to point out Talia dispatching Barry and Kara with a hand gesture, as reason for them to retreat, and it worked. As the legends left Sara felt soft fingers wrap around her body, rising up to a rather large bosom, even before it's owner grew to 50ft tall 'Damn, she might be bigger than Nyssa, only slightly but still' Sara thought, her brain getting smutty now the danger was technically past

"You'll have plenty of time to get acquainted later, for now I have one more person to acquire" Talia purrs then grins, moving the book to her stomach

"What? You said..."

"Nothing of value, but that's beside the point, there is nothing else in this city that appeals to me, so we'll be going now" she opens the book, it's light messing with the shadows on her face before it fades as she absorbs the book into herself, giving her instant access to the artefact's power, as well as ensuring it can't be stolen from her. With that in mind, she teleports to her next location, finding her sister curled up in bed in a pretty nondescript house, clearly dissolving the League wasn't doing her nay good in the long run. Once more a reasonable size she was swift and quiet as she moves to Nyssa's bed and straddles the sleeping woman, pinning her arms with one hand as she watches recognition form in sleep idled eyes

"Talia?" she whispers, to which the elder smiles

"Hello Nyssa, it's been so long, I even got you a present" she coos, dropping the now tiny Sara beside her head

"Beloved!" Nyssa gasps, the blond running up to her, cuddling her cheek and kissing it repeatedly, despite everything happy to be reunited once more. Then the former assassin's blood ran cold "I know you are angry with me sister, but please let Sara go she has nothing to do with this"

"Oh" Talia hums "But she's so cute, I can see why you fell for her, I bet she tastes so sinful. Not that it matters" Talia smirks before grabbing Nyssa's head, leaning down and running her tongue up the side of her face, overshadowing any trace of Sara under her saliva "I have plans for you"

Pinning Sara down with a finger Talia's eyes begin to glow, but what happens? [Note in all scenarios the League is intact and Talia is in charge, Malcolm never was, it went straight from Ra's to Talia]

1) As a mix of fun and punishment Talia makes both of them her shrunken servents, never allowed off her body unless she allows it, but as she is a benevolent mistress they are considered partners and when they do a good job that day they can sleep together in her cleavage or ass, if not Nyssa spends the night under her toes, while Sara is shoved head first into her pussy.
2) Talia decides to start her punishment by doing the one thing Nyssa never did: Make Sara her bride, she then rewrites her memories so every moment spent with Nyssa is now with Talia. Finally she shrinks Nyssa and makes it that she was their slave, unbreakable due to rough treatment , accidentally being stepped or sat on and Sara's frequent use of her as a sex toy, with Nyssa cursed to remember how things were as well as are.
3) Given their loyalty to each other Talia makes a slight edit to history: Nyssa and Talia grew up close, like proper siblings, and later when they fell for the same woman agreed to share her, with some occasional pleasure of one another. With that dealt with she decides the new trio should have some fun bonding together, so leads them to a model city she summoned, with Sara's former friends and allies shrunken and powerless for them to enjoy.

The fact nobody other than her (not even her beloved, though Nyssa wished she did) knew of the location of her little hide away meant she was instantly suspicious of a strange book she never remembered seeing before or bringing into the house. Picking up the item she felt a prescience in her mind followed by a booming voice

'I've travelled far to this place and time to lay this precious burden at your feet. Use this book to reshape the world as you see fit. Show them what a real god can do'

While unsure as to how accurate the voice's statement was, the idea of being as powerful as they claimed did appeal to the former assassin, sure she had basically been the 2nd strongest person in the League but that was the thing 2nd, there was always someone controlling her, limiting her movements and telling her what she could and couldn't do. Not any more.

Caressing the leather binding Nyssa decides this version of reality wasn't something she was happy to exist in, so any changes would be better than what she had, opening it and grinning as she felt the Book's limitless power engulf her.

2) The book picks up on a submissive streak that never existed before falling for Sara, and seeing she would be happier this way has her shrink and become Sara and Ava's pet and tiny lover, spending her nights on, between or inside one of the women she loves.

14122141.content:
Lena was once more working her way through some of the more 'off the record' of her brother's projects, this case being a strange book he'd failed to get open, both him and all the scientists he'd had working on it. The book was strange, too old to date and gave off an energy signature that hinted at a very strong power source, but was completely unrecognisable to human technology, also there was a complex locking mechanism sealing it shut that despite the efforts of several teams still remained attached to the book and keeping it sealed.. As Lena entered her hidden basement lab, she was glad neither Supergirl of the DEO were aware of the book's existence, mostly because of the headache it would most likely cause for her before they take it off her hands 'for her own good' or whatever bullshit excuse they give her.

One of the scientists in charge of trying to open the lock keeping the book sealed had jokingly theorised the device was waiting for someone worthy to find it before it could be opened and whatever power it held could be unleashed, something Lena thought of as really stupid.... until she rested her hand on the locking mechanism and the thing clicked open and fell off the front of the book 'Well shit' Lena thinks as she lifts the book 'I guess Anderson was right after all' she then opens the book and her eyes were open for the first time......

She understands, this artefact, known in most worlds as the Book of Destiny, could shape reality to the users preference with simply a thought. Lena may think big with her goals, curing cancer being her most well known one, but she also knew fucking with reality tended to go badly so completely warping the world was not a good plan. Still she was tempted to do one thing, something she hoped would make her life a little better in the long run.

"I want to get out of the shadow of the Luthor name" she willed into the book, which pulsed and rippled before following through with the vague command

What did she do?

1) In this world the Luthors aren't Evil (Lillian's still a c**t because Lena can't imagine her any other way) Lex is even accepting of Law Abiding Aliens and is still best friends with Clark after sharing his secret with him and Lois back when they were in their teens. Lena isn't CEO anymore, instead Head of R&D for LexCorp where she is much happier. Also one night when her and Lex were stargazing what they thought was a meteor hit near their house and Lena discovered a tiny pod with a girl inside, who she made friends with and later became her tiny lover: Kara Zor-El. The only snag for Lena is Kara's mind wasn't as affected by the Book as you would expect( having just arrived from Earth 1 as the rewriting took hold) so while she won't be freaking out about her size, it's still Supergirl Kara in the body of Lena's girlfriend and jokingly called sex slave Kara Astra Ze-Luthor. Whoops

2) Lena never had to deal with the Luthor name because she was never adopted by the Luthors. Lena was one of a rare number of individuals who were born and inch tall and grew to a max of 4 inches in height, and would have basically lived the life of the borrowers if she hadn't been discovered by Kara soon after arriving on earth. Now in National City she was seen by most as an exotic pet of her owner Kara Danvers (and as more a toy to some, given the offers from Maggie and Alex to take her out for some fun), except by Kara herself, who still saw the Irish ravenette as her best (and oldest) friend. The blond becoming a literal Goddess to her in size really didn't help quell the crush she had been developing on Supergirl, but oh well.

14122144221.content:
Sam sighs deeply at another long day at work, glad that Lena allowed her to keep her job even after everything that had happened, including trying to kill her. Maybe it was the imprisoning her under radioactive bars, or she just didn't hold it against Sam but Lena seemed content to pretend all was good and Reign was something completely unrelated to her, something Sam wishes she could do.

As she went to grab her things and head home to Ruby she notices something odd about the contents of her desk, mainly the old style book sitting where he laptop had been 5 minutes ago before she packed it away. On it's cover, in a flowing script was the title: Book of Destiny. Curious Sam goes to pick it up, hearing...

'This book is the key to unlocking your potential Samantha, use it wisely, and become the God this world deserves'

Sam releases the book in shock, only now feeling the power leaking even from the sealed state of the artefact. A part of her wanted to leave the book alone or bring it to Lena (she knew the girl barely slept, so was probably still working away in her office), but another part was intrigued by the possibility

While Reign had been separated from her and killed by Supergirl (Sam even saw her do it and Reign fall into ash) Lena explained that due them being one and the same until recently and now being aware of it Reign would be the voice and the face of her darker thoughts, the woman may be gone, but the echo would always be the Devil on her shoulder. It was that voice that whispered sweetly in her ear, reminding her of the power she once held, how she could use it to help people, keep Ruby safe. But it also brought the idea of punishing Kara, because evil or not Reign was part of Sam, and the girl of steel deserves to suffer for killing her.

With a goal in mind Sam opened the book, bathed in it's blue glow as the energy wave passes through National City in seconds, changing how things ran just as quickly

Next Day

Sam was glad the book gave her the knowledge to go with the powers, as what she was doing right now would be a problem otherwise. Currently dressed in the expected outfit on the Supers, Sam was dealing with some alien bank robbers, walking through them while also testing she had all the expected powers: Strength, speed, flight, heat vision and freeze breath. There was one more though, which she wanted and the book gave to her, size manipulation, one she used on the leader of this ground after taking out the rest of her crew, shrinking her down to bug size before threatening to crush her under her boot, no surprise she surrendered almost immediately after her boot became the sky. Sam grew the woman back before knocking her out, leaving them all to the DEO as they weren't her problem any more.

Sam was glad for the new ability, as all the others had been powers Reign used so it was something wholly her own. She also had the book remove her vulnerability to Kryptonite, though she was in no hurry to see if it worked or if it was beyond even the Book's power.

Somewhere else

Kara groans as she comes to, feeling like she'd been brought on a 2 day bender with Mon-El, which just made her more angry when she found herself unable to move. The semi darkness was good for Kara's not a hangover, but was bad for someone trying to move around in, so when Kara finally does get around to wriggling herself mostly free she is shocked when she sees the source of her troubles: A bear. Her cloak had been caught under a toy bear and as that though flashes through Kara's mind so does another, she'd been shrunk (the idea of there beign giants around did cross her mind but she dismissed it as giants aren't known for stealth. Looking around she sees that she appears to be in some kind of toy box, if the teddy, dolls and other plush toys were any indication. All the light in the room was caused by a key hole in the wall, which after unlatching her cape to prevent more catching Kara manoeuvres another of the toys so she could see out of. What she saw made her blood run cold, she knew who's room this was, she'd been there before, she was in a toy box, in Ruby's Arias bedroom. It was then she felt tremors, someone was coming her way... but who?

1) Sam: Here to check that the book did exactly what she asked it to, powerful Supergirl, now a doll for her daughter
2) Ruby: Aware of her doll's living status, she has fun with the one friend who can never leave her
3) Lena/Alex: Babysitting Ruby, can Kara get help from her best friend or sister, or will they see her as a special part of Ruby's doll collection?

The threat of Reign was real. Kara knew she had to do something,and thought that she had a lot of allies to fight her, the girl of steel knew some people from another Earth she would like to have by her side for the final fight. " You sure you don't wanna me to come with you ? " Alex asked worried.

Kara realized that something went wrong once she arrived in a...giant living room. She was standing on a giant carpet near a giant couch. " What ? What's going on there ? " She wondered looking with confusion at the giant environnement. She didn't know where she was, but the most important thing was that she didn't know why she was...sooo small.

On the meantime, Lyla Michael has sent her son to sleep and went back to the living room, she didn't know what to watch on TV. John will be busy for the whole night, something she was getting used to. But when she arrived, she noticed something on the ground, standing on her carpet.

" What's that ? " she wondered as she bent down over the thing. Kara could recognized the giant, it was someone from the argus or something...from what she could remember the last time she went on this Earth.

" Hey ! i'm Supergirl do you remember me ? " Kara asked clumsily.

" Yeah i remember....But why are you here and why are you so...tiny ? " Lyla asked.

" that's a good question but not the most important one. We need some help in our Earth, that's why i came."

Lyla certainly didn't expect to see a tiny supergirl in her room, but the fact she was tiny now might be an advantage she could use. In fact, even if Lyla was gratefull for Kara's help against the dominators, she also knew all the powers the girl of steel had, and she was a threat. What will be Lyla's choice ?

Despite the dangers she posed, Lyla knew they couldn't have beaten the Dominators without her, so in light of that gave this one chance and hear her out 'Well tell me what's wrong, I might not have powers but I'm good at what I do'

Kara smiles 'That's a fitting description of my sister, she's a normal human but you'd never guess with all the badass stuff she does. Best agent the DEO ever had, though I'm a little biased' she explains causing Lyla to smile in response

'I'm sure we'd be able to swap stories if we ever met, but you came to our earth for a reason besides becoming a Superdoll' she smirks at her little joke, which widens when she see's Kara's adorable pout

'Rude. But yes, we have a problem I can't deal with alone. Her name is Reign, she's a Kryptonian like me, or at least that's what she seemed to be when we first fought her. She's a lot stronger than me, in fact she was the person to do the most damage ever in my time as Supergirl, not even throwing Fort Rozz into space did a number on me like she did, I was in a coma for 2 months. She also gets her power from another source, as she was able to still have all hers despite being under a Blue Sun (Fun fact: Blue suns actually strengthen Kryptonians, and no forms of light kill a specific sex of any species. It was just CW being political assholes) and kryptonite just barely irritates her, even a levels that would kill me outright' at this Kara tenses and looks at her boots 'I actually got into a fight with a good friend of mine, she managed to synthesize kryptonite at a strength that caused her pain, and I lashed out because as I said, if it hurts Reign it is nearly instantly toxic to me'

Lyla hums 'So is there anything else that should be able to harm your kind, or whatever she is?'

'Magic basically renders our invulnerability mute but they're pretty sure magic is how Reign and the other Worldkillers were created, luckily they were easier to deal with, so it's back to just Reign making our lives difficult' Kara continues 'I thought, given we were able to fend off Overgirl, well mostly me but there were other issues besides her to deal with, I thought that if everyone was focused on her we could take her down. Unless you have a better plan?'

What's Lyla's response?

choices: Lyla wants to call someone, but first Kara had to do something for her
143112.content:
"hmmm...you got a complicate story for me to deal with. " Lyla said trying to understand everything Kara said. " I'm sorry but i don't know how to help " she sighed.

" Oh..." Kara tried to not look disappointed, but she wasn't able to hide it. " that's fine, well i think should go back now "

" Wait, i told you that i don't know how to help, but maybe i can call someone who'll be able to find a way to fix your problem. " Lyla added before Kara used her device.

" Seriously ? " Kara asked happilly.

" Yeah, why don't we call either Felicity Smoak or Caitlin Snow ? But first, i think i'll be able to do something for you : to figure out why you are small. "

" Sounds like good news at the end. I'm with you ! " Kara replied.

Lyla smiled and placed her hand near Kara. " Jump in we're going at the Argus's headquarters " the giantess said. But Kara just raised, flying in front of her face. " I still have my power, so you don't need to have me in your hand."

" Yeah, but i don't wanna go to the office with something flying around me, mostly because someone could see us. You really should be hidden. " Lyla said, which annoyed a bit Kara.

" Guess you're right, but you see i don't like to feel like a doll or something, i would rather find another way to come with you " Kara replied, she didn't want to admit it but she was a bit arrogant sometimes, mostly in a situation where she was the "goddess" she used to be for everyone. But she suddenly feel on the ground.

" Kara are you ok ? " Lyla asked worried.

" Yeah yeah, i didn't feel anything. My powers seems to mess with me but at last i still feel invulnerable, which explain why i didn't feel anything. "

" I think this answer the question. You'll come in my hand, since you can't really fly " Lyla concluded before taking the tiny girl of steel in her fist, and stood up to her full height. " I just need to call the babysitter for watching over John, since i don't know when my husband will come back"

Kara nodded, frustrated to be held like that, but there were more important things to solve for now, so it was time to forget her pride.

Once Lyla was ready to go, she placed the tiny girl of steel inside her bra, wich embarrassed Supergirl as she wasn't even warned. The babysitter came quickly, greeted Lyla who left as soon as she arrived.

It took several long minutes for Kara before they arrive at the Argus, Lyla heading directly to the lab where she picked up Kara from her bra and placed her on the desk. " Ok now i need to check your body, please lay down."

Kara didn't like that, but obeyed, allowing Lyla to take a blood sample, but it failed. Kara's body was invulnerable after all, so the sting couldn't go throught her skin.

" Oh yeah i forgot it " Kara said.

" Hmmm...i thought that since your powers don't work correctly, there was a chance for me to take your blood. But it seems your passive powers are fine. It's just your active powers that you can't use " Lyla explained.

" Great...really great ! " Kara felt not only too small, but also helpless now. But she focused on Lyla's intentions to find out the problem with her size. " Hey why don't you take my device. Cisco gave it to me, maybe the problem comes from there. "

" it's...too small for me study. But, there's a possiblity that your Earth and mine have differents scale. And that maybe, the last times you came on my Earth there were something to make you bigger, so we didn't see the problem." Lyla said, uncertain.

"hmmm...i don't like how it sounds, i would rather to not believe it " Kara replied almost angry. She was the most powerfull girl in her earth, and didn't want to believe she was helpless in Barry's earth. But maybe, someone else could tell it, and find a way to fix her problem with Reign on the way.

A little later

'Caitlin glad you could make it... what's that?' Lyla asks when the scientist arrives with a large box in her arms

'You said Supergirl was having problems, as a doctor I thought having the nesicary equipment was vital, which is why the leftover Red sunlamps are here in my arms' Catlin explains, Lyla frowns and turns to the desk

'You didn't mention you're weak to the colour red' she whispers angrily

'Not the colour red, the radiation of a Red Sun, I get my powers from the light of a Yellow Sun, my homeworld orbited a Red Sun' Kara explains, only then did Caitlin see her and gasp

'Oh my, you're so smalllll' she coos, causing Kara to blush deep red 'I can see why you called, was thi meta related? I presume if it were alien her own people would have treated her'

Lyla smirks 'Neither, this happened when she crossed over to our world, the portal shrunk her or lack of a better term. I wondered if maybe her earth was on a smaller scale to ours, so when she stepped through she was sent directly as is, rather than altered to fit in with the rest of the world' she suggests'

Snow frowns ' Possibly, but I don't think I can help much in that regard specifically, the intricacies of multidimensional drift is more Cisco and Professor Stein's area of expertise. But given it's the anniversary and Martin's no longer with us, that's not an avenue we can explore. Luckily biology is, and I brought the red sun lamps to allow me to do so' her smile resembled something more at home on Killer Frost than Caitlin Snow as she pulled out and turned on the red lamp, Kara already beginning to regret coming here looking for help, She did at least feel safer in Dr. Snow's hand than say a child or teen's hands, she knew what they did thinking about her, as well as to dolls of her on her earth, she didn't need to see what they would do with a mostly powerless (and in the red light, getting steadily more powerless) tiny Supergirl

The red lamp made it possible for Caitlin to draw the tiniest amount of blood, as well as give Kara the equivalent of a CT scan, highly amused by the results 'I know Barry said you guys were solar powered but your cells act more like a plant's than I expected, absorbing unimaginable levels of solar energy and using it to augment themselves. This is incredible. And your DNA, it's incredibly advanced and complicated, I don't think I've seen such a crowded model since the last time I watched V' the nerd gushes, clearly she hasn't gotten to do researchy things in a while working for Team Flash

So what happens next?

1) Caitlin suggests, (following Lyla's theory their worlds were simply on a different scale to each other) if they can get the shrinking process to become repeatable, tricking/leading Reign onto their Earth would make dealing with her at least 1,000 times easier
2) Given they were (most likely) never going to get this chance again, Caitlin and Lyla decide to have a little fun with Kara, under the guise of 'more tests'

As soon as Lyla arrives at Kara's eath, things were so differents and...tiny. The buildings, the houses, everything, it seemed like she was the only one in charge of everything.. But she couldn't help but gives a small kick on one of the building, destroying it instantly.

Her actions didn't take long to be noticed, and the panick began at National city. Lyla just stood there, trying to not follow her instinct by destroying everything, she had to focus on her goal.

" Listen everyone, i'm not here to hurt you. In fact, i came to save you all. " she said. " Just tell me where's Reign and i'll promise, her and I will disappear forever "

The message has been heard, even thought that people were running everywhere, screaming for help. She tried to not crush anyone, but some cars didn't get this luck and all she could do was to hope there were no one inside. After some minutes, a chopper flied around her head, and a familiar face appeared from it. It was Alex Danvers, Kara's sister.

" Please don't make anotherr step ! we have to talk ! I'm agent Danvers from the DEO ! " the tiny woman yelled.

Lyla couldn't help but think that Kara's sister was cute.

" My name's Lyla. Your sister came into my world to ask me help against Reign, i need to know where she is..but... " the giantess started. " ...i think you should go with me instead "

" What ?! I don't understand, my sister would never let a giant woman destroying the city only to get Reign, she would find a better way ! " Alex replied confused.

" you missed that part where i said you should go with me instead of Reign. "

" I'm not coming with you ! just let's talk for now ! " Alex insisted.

Kara twirls the device between her fingers before stubbornness wins out 'No, you guys worry about how much of a threat I can be to your earth.... and don't say you don't I've seen that look on a lot of military on my earth, it means if I had the chance I'd put a kryptonite blade through between your eyes. The point is, I'm not risking my earth to rampaging giantess, I'm leaving and I'll be back with Reign or not at all' before either woman can stop her, Kara pressed the button and falls through the portal

You said so yourself everyone else is an insect compared to you, so once you kill me it'll be almost too easy' she goads, it actually amused her how shot the usually unflappable woman can be if she hits the right spots

'Supergirl, don't do this' Alex warns but it's too late

Kara smiles ever so slightly 'Catch me if you can!' she chirps, shooting off like a rocket, diving and swirving as she took the Kryptonian across and the outside the city limits into the desert, getting her focused enough on tailing her she got tunnel vison and wasn't paying attention to her surroundings. When the woman was just shy of reaching out and grabbing her cape, Kara activates the device once more, the portal swallowing her up with Reign unable to manoeuvre her way around it time and following her through.

With that in mind he hugged the walls and made his way to the youngest Queen's bedroom.

Thea's room was a lot less girly than he remembered it, feeling a bit more punk rock, but then again that's what 5 years will do to you. Thea herself while older still sat the same way when she was relaxing though: Edge of her bed reading a book with an ear bud on and the other sitting on her now noticeable chest, with her left foot gently rocking, her toes just barely touching the ground.

Oliver knew he couldn't get her attention from the doorway or even the floor if he were honest, but had to come up with something, especially before Moira got desperate enough to involve Thea in her search (that is if she hadn't planned to let Thea in on the secret from the start. But how could he get this giant of a woman's attention?

1)Even when they were kids Thea had sensitive feet, after all if Oliver wanted her to get off him all he had to do was tickle her soles and she shot off him like she'd been fired from a cannon. In theory all Oliver had to was pinch her baby toe or run his hands along her arch and he'd have her attention, but the problem was she might kick out or step on him. So a high risk, high reward option as well as the most immediate seeing as her foot was right in front of him
2) Just because she couldn't see of hear him from the floor doesn't mean he couldn't try from closer to her, after everything he's done shimmying up her duvet should be child's play, climbing her body would be a little harder but once he was high enough (if trying to climb her wasn't noticeable enough for her) he would be in direct visual and audible range for him to do the usual wave and yell when you want to get someone's attention.
145231113.title: Oliver escapes and meet his sister

choices: Thea is clear : she won't help Oliver as she wants him with her
Thea will help...probably. She's not sure yet !
Thea doesn't take things seriously...and mess with Oliver for a while
Thea massages Oliver in her hands, not wanting to talk about helping him
1452311131.content:
Considering every available options, Oliver thought that the best thing to do was to be in contact with his sister's foot. Thea seemed to be unaware of him, too busy to dance with the upper part of her body, eyes closed. So screaming won't help, and he couldn't expect her to see him. On the other side, he remembered that Thea had sensitive feet. This helped him a lot in the past, when Thea used to play with his face with her feet, which he never liked..but at the end touching her feet was enought to stop her from rubbing her sole on his nose. And now he was going to use that to get her attention. He went closer and closer, still hoping somehow that Thea will open her eyes and sees him before he had to touch her gigantic foot, but it didn't happen.

Olivr was now enought close to her feet, but get some hesitations. Thea might react with violence, and considering his new size, it might hurt...a lot. But after being for some years on an island trying to survive, he couldn't believe that he would be killed by Thea's foot.
That helped him to do what he had to do, and with enought confidence, touched her pinky toe, rubbing it a little before he suddenly get poked away as Thea's quickly reacted to it by kicking whatever touched her. She openned her eyes, looking at what looked like a doll laid on the ground in pain and almost had an heart attack. She removed her earbud, as she quickly recognized the form of her brother.

" Ollie ? I must be dreaming ! " She said shocked.

" No you don't...Thea i don't have time to explain, Mom shrunk me i need your help ! " Ollie replied at his confused sister. Using her both hands, she caught Oliver tight in them, hurting him a bit while raising him to her face.

" Wait...What ? "

" Thea please, hide me somwhere ! " He begged. Thea had no choice but to listen to him and found an empty box on her desk enought tall to keep him safe for a while...That was close as Moira entere her room.

" Mom ? " She turned back to face Moira, who seemed annoyed.

" Sweetie are you okay ? " She asked suspicious.

" Yeah, i just hate when you enter my room without my permission ! "

Moira looked all around the room checking for something obviously, and Thea finally understood the part oliver said : " Mom shrunk me ! ". Deep inside she felt some anger, but did her best to hide it.

" Sorry, i just wanted to know if you were okay " Moira said before leaving the room, and Thea had to close the door by herself as her mother seemed to didn't care about her privacy. She then released Oliver from his prison and grabbed him in both hands again.

" Can't believe Mom did this to you, your own son...Now will you explain ? "

Oliver took a breath before saying the most essential part, making sure to not mention he was the hood. All he said was that Moira worked with someone who thinks that Oliver knows something about a dark project.

" So Mom is not the one we think she is...What a surprise. You were right to come for me, thought that i could have hurt you with my foot. "

" It's ok, i'm a survivor from an island remember ? It's not your who's gonna kill me..." Oliver joked making Thea smile. " So are you going to help me ? "
1452311131.title: Poke her foot

14523111313.content:
Thea adopts a thinking pose... before shaking her head 'Nah, we're not going to do anything like that, at least not for now' at Oliver's annoyed look (Which Thea thinks but doesn't voice he clearly gets from their mom) she explains 'I have spent a lot of time by myself these last 5 years, do you know how often I was in here wishing I had someone who would spend time with me? Play with me? Well guess what, you're here and you're not exactly going anywhere unless you feel Mom's a better option than me now so you're my playmate for the next little while' After this she locks her room (just in case) and bounces onto the bed, placing Oliver down in front of her crossed legs.

The shrunken vigilante sighs 'So what do you have in mind?' she asks to which she smirks

'I've thought about that and it's weird that there's a lot more roughhousing in our past than I expected. A lot more high pitched squealing from you tickling my feet too' she teases a little 'So that's the plan, how about it Ollie, afraid to rough house with your wittle sister?'

Oliver wants to comment that the only little thing about the young woman his sister had become was her stud earrings, but swallows that thought 'You do know I survived that island for 5 years, I'm a lot tougher than I used to be' he slightly boasts

Thea just grins wider 'I know, that's why I have backup' Oliver looks confused for a moment before Thea uncrosses her legs and pins him between her feet, rubbing them against him before spreading out, trapping him in a triangle formed by her legs and the end of the bed '2 against 1 should even the odds don't you think?' she asks, then looks slightly worried when Oliver doesn't respond with words, more so coughing and wheezing 'Did I hurt you or something, my feet can't smell that bad' she half teases half worries

Oliver smiles slightly as he coughs 'It's not bad per say... okay it's a little intense. But on the bright side, unless they're my size, I doubt any future boy or girlfriend you have will have a problem with your feet smelling of honey and coconut' he grimaces 'I think I can taste the damn thing'

Thea laughs 'Oh that's my new lotion, Laurel got it for me the other month. Guess that's another added difficulty for you Ollie' she coos and the battle commences.

Oliver uses all the training he had acquired over the years away but somehow Thea's feet were still able to pin him, luckily the scent was much less overpowering from a single source, in this case the heel of one foot holding down his legs while the toes of the other foot were clenched around his neck (gently as she didn't want him to pass out). Despite the humiliation this situation causes it wasn't as bad as it could have been: Thea kept good care of herself and the lotion kept her feet smooth and fairly soft, pinned between then and her bed was actually more relaxing to him than it probably should, he actually had to keep his eyes open so he didn't zone out and do something stupid like sniff her feet, he knew Thea wouldn't be angry per say, but she would tease him endlessly, and this situation itself was enough teasing and blackmail material for the foreseeable future for her, her didn't need to add to it

Eventually Thea got bored of pining and rubbing Oliver against her feet so decided...

1) Sticking to the more aggressive/confrontational activities she decides to give him another fight, between her ass and his speed. Basically she's going to try sit on him or flatten him under her ass, simple if nothing else
2) Thea decides they should have a little game of Hide and Seek, with a little wager: If she can find Oliver he has to do one thing for her (no matter how strange, bad or just plain wrong it is). On the other hand if Oliver can last half an hour without being found she would help him right now with his size issues.
14523111313.title: Queen sibling playtime

145231113132.content:
Thea grins as she makes her suggestion "How about a game of Hide and Seek? You can't leave my room of course, both because Mom might see you and me creeping around the mansion looking for you might tip her off" she explains, at least trying to sell the idea to her justifiably paranoid little big brother

"You're serious?"

"Yeah, you could call it training to keep out of sight of Mom while we look for something to fix you, or you could just think of it as a little fun and an excuse to calm the fuck down for half an hour"

Oliver frowns even if Thea did have a point he hadn't really had a moment to just relax for over 5 years, seeing as he was safe with Thea maybe he should just let his troubles fly for the half hour she mentioned... speaking of which "Why half an hour?"

Thea's grin widens "I was thinking of making a little wager, a rather simple one really: You hide and I seek, if I find you then you have to do exac5ly as I say and we'll have a few other games before going off looking for trouble, but if you can remain hidden for half an hour I'll bring you to get help straight away. Sound good?"

Oliver knows despite the questioning down it wasn't one, more a statement, they were doing this, and if he didn't manage to evade her he was screwed "Sounds fine, as long as you don't cheat" he replies, trying to remain playful and carefree whle he had the chance

Thea gasps and holds her chest "Why I would never. Go hide Ollie, I'll stay up here and count" she kisses the top of his head then lies back with her eyes closed, a content smile on her face as she slowly counts.

With little time to lose and not wanting to know what exactly she had planned for him Oliver slides down the bedsheet and drops to the ground. There were quite a few places he could go, drawers were left only half closed, handbags on their sides, but he didn't want to use them, partly because with how out in the open they were Thea would check them relatively quickly ,as well as the fact if she does find him he'd prefer it not wrapped up in one of her panties by accident. Instead he does a complete 180 and runs under the bed, glad to see Thea was just a cluttered under here as he remembered, it being relatively easy for him to find somewhere he could relax for the next half hour while she roots around her room, at least if their mom comes in again Thea could claim to be cleaning.

A little while passes and as he expected Thea checked the drawers first, actually sounding disappointed when she didn't find him there but continued none the less.

What is the result of this game?

1) Thea finds him, and given how good he felt under her in the last game she wants him to rub her feet while she come up with the next game for them to play
2) Thea finds him. Given the amount of time out of her life as well as his current size, Thea can't resist the opportunity, and makes Oliver her sex toy for the rest of the day, introducing him to both her eager holes
3) Oliver manages to remain undetected until the timer runs out, meaning Thea has to help him get his size restored. He wishes she'd told him she was going to put him down the back of her pants for the journey there, and she probably should have told him she was heading straight to ... Laurel for help.
145231113132.title: Hide and seek with consequences

choices: Moira places him in a box, while giving the informations to Malcolm
Thea suddenly appears, did she see Oliver ?
Oliver ask Moira to call Felicity.She needs another vial to work on a cure
Moira clearly refuses. She wants him to stay with her, too bad for the city
14523112.content:
" What's the hell is happenning to me ? " Oliver wonders when he realizes how ridiculously small he was. A part of him feels scared, which mean a lot considering all he went throught before, Oliver didn't think he could be scared of something again. How did he shrunk, he has no idea on the moment, but things just become more clear once he notices his mother walking into his room, her expression says all he needs to know...he got shrunk for some reason by his own mother !

" the tea " he figures out the answer of "how". " Probably odourless that's why i didn't suspect anything." he looks at his now gigantic mother who seems to feel sad and guilty, but this doesn't explain why she did this. So Oliver decides to ask her directly :

" Why ? Why did you do that ? "

Oliver is leaded by his shock and anger, he doesn't even realize on the moment that he was too small to be heard. Beside Moira is doing her best to not burst into tears.

" I'm sorry Oliver...I didn't know what this...would do to you. " The giant woman admits. " I'll ask him for a cure i promise...but only if you tell me everything Robert told you before he...." Moira takes a deep breath, trying to be strong. What is done is done, now she has no choice and has to question her own shrunken son. Oliver doesn't know who is "him", but he guess she meant the guy who gave Moira the shrinking stuff.

" Mom, you have to tell me what's going on. Who's behind this ? " he asks, letting the giant mature woman know that she has to bend down to be able to hear him, and that's what she does, putting herself on her knee, in front of Oliver's bed, and Oliver himself now in front of the upper part of his mother giant body.

" WHO ASKED YOU TO DO THIS ? " he yells.

" No, no, no...Oliver. I'm the one asking questions." Moira manages to act more like a soldier than a mother, putting her feelings aside. " You have to tell me everything your father told you "

" Or else ? Are you going to torture me or something ? Your own son ? "

" No, if you refuse i won't be able to help you. You know, myself and Thea always wonder where are you when you disappear, and what you are doing. And i think you somehow got involved in dangerous business, which started to annoy some powerfull peolple."

Oliver has to admit that this time he just couldn't solve his problem without revealing the truth to his mother. He couldn't get to Felicity, in fact he couldn't even escape his own bed. And Moira was somehow like him : she will do whatever she had to do to protect her family, just like he will do anything to protect the city along with his family.

" Fine." Oliver sighs. Moira places her hand next to him, allowing Oliver to walk into her plam so she can raise him to hear him better. And what comes out from his mouth next, was half a shock for the woman. Oliver revealed he was the Hood, and told her about the list he received from his father.

"....I didn't want either you or Thea knowing the truth. But it seems you're getting some troubles too Mom, just tell me the name of the one behind this, help me to fix my size and in return i'll save you and the city."

Moira stands up, looking at her tiny son as she tries to figure out how to react to his revelations, and his request.

Then...
14523112.title: Bug sized

145231122.content:
Before Moira can fully process the information they both hear the floorboard outside Oliver's room squeak, both Moira aware mostly because she deliberately avoided it to come in so as to have the element of surprise, though her own surprise meant the door was still wide open. What this means is that when she stands and hides Oliver behind her back Thea is staring at her, and she hoped the brunette hadn't seen anything

'What are you hiding?' she asks, and there goes that hope

'I don't know what you're talking about'

'Cut the crap Mom, I get lied to enough I can tell when it happens, such as right now' Thea snaps walking into the room but remaining outside the blond's personal space 'So what are you doing in Ollie's room and what are you hiding from me?'

Moira closes her fist and if Oliver wasn't so small she'd be worried about hurting him right now 'I'm not hiding anything from you sweetie, but if you want to talk about this paranoia you're experience...' she is interrupted when Thea steps forward and nearly pokes her eye out with her finger

'See exactly like that: You're lying to me, Oliver's lying to me, even Tommy, Laurel and Walter are lying! You all seem to think I'm some kid that need hiding from the truth, but I'm a grown woman who's getting pissed off that things are happening around her without being told about them' she borderline growls angrily, Moira's fists clenching slightly

'Maybe they treat you like a child because you're throwing a tantrum like one' Moira replies sighing deeply 'Besides, I didn't raise you to talk to your mother like that young lady'

Thea scoffs 'I'll treat you like my mom when you start acting like it again' she says and that actually stings: she knew things were never great between herself and Thea, Oliver was the one she'd been closer with while Thea had been drawn to her father (Both actually, not that she knew that). Things got worse after the Queen's Gambit went down, a rift opening up between the 2 of them that just continued to get wider.

It was this growing turmoil as well as the information she'd just learnt that made her consider telling them, not just Thea about Oliver but them both about what she'd done or been part of. Then they could all figure out what to do next from a better informed position. On the other hand, Thea was impulsive and clearly angry, she didn't want her to slash out and try crush Oliver in her current state, sure Malcolm had said he would be safe but she wasn't too sure she trusted him, after all he could have just told her the vial was a shrinking serum.

What happens?

1) Moira pockets Oliver as she moves showing Thea her empty hands. She storms off and Moira decides what to do with her shrunken son
2) Moira reveals Oliver to Thea who responds rather similarly to how she did. After she calms down all information is shared and they talk about what comes next as a dysfunctional family (I imagine a lot of both women talking over or ignoring Oliver's responses/comments, blaming it on his size)
145231122.title: Thea suddenly appears

choices: Thea forces Moira to give her Oliver, or else she'll call the police
Thea leaves Oliver in Moira's hand, she doesn't want to talk with any of them
Oliver get some attention, and convinces Thea to forgive their mother
Thea leaves, and swear she'll get a vial to shrink Moira someday
1452311222.content:
Moira feels she was loosing her daughter,and for good reasons. After all, Moira had to lie a lot these last years to protect both thea and oliver. But now, she has betrayed her son and had him in her hand, and Thea was bored of all these liars. That's when Moira decides to tell the truth, assuming the consequences of it, and shows to her daughter what she has in her hand.

Moira's palm open in front of Thea, allowing Oliver to see his giant sister, with a shock expression on her face.

"Oliver ? Why...is he so...small ? " she asks confuses.

" I did this to him. Malcolm needed to know what you're brother knows about his projects. He gave me a vial to make him talk, but i didn't know the effects. I was as surprised as you when i found him shrunk on the bed." She admits.

Thea is looking at her diminutive brother in her mother's hand, and doesn't know what to say when she suddenly slaps Moira.

" You should be the shrunken one there ! " she says, and Moira doesn't feel the need to ask what Thea would do to her if she was shrunken. Her appearent anger, let Moira knows Thea wouldn't show any mercy to her. Olivers waves his hands trying to get both giantesses's attention, which doesn't work.

" That's not all." Moira starts, knowing she probably deserves her daughter's anger. " Oliver s the Hood " This new information was probably too much for Thea too bear, but to Oliver's surprise, Thea seems to accept it easily.
"...so it meant that you're working with some bad people who wished to shrink Ollie, the one who protected the city several times so you can question him, torture him or something, am i right ? "

" It's not what you think ! i really didn't know that...." Moira starts before receving another slap from her daughter.

" Hey you two just calm down ! " Oliver begins, but his futile attemps to talk are just ignored by the two giantesses who keeps arguing. By the time, Moira has to close her hand around him, leaving Oliver trapped in her fist while Moira stills tries to convinces Thea that her actions was only meant to protect the family.

" So now that it's time for confessions, do you have anything else to say to me ? " Thea asks, and Moira decides to tell another tuth, as now she had anything to loose.

" Yes sweetie. Malcolm Merlyn is behind something big which is goint to happen soon to Star City...but he's also your father " She says, knowing that she's already lost her daughter. In fact, Moira seems to have lost everything during the last 10minutes. Thea seems more shocked than before, but she's also a strong personn. She finally knows everything her mother tried to hide from her, but she honestly didn't see the last revelation coming. Malcolm, her father ? It meant that she tried to get some sex with...her half brother, Tommy ? Thea wants to vomit on the moment.

Oliver is simply ignored in Moira's hand,no matter how hard he tries to punch her palm to get some attention.


What now ?
1452311222.title: Everyone knows everything... now what?

choices: Moira tries get a replacement vial, Thea resists her urges
14523112223.content:
Seeing as he was running out of options, things were getting way off track and he was desperate Oliver decided to make a rash decision, the moment Moira's hand lessened it's grip he jumped from her hand, landing on Thea's shirt, the brunette yelps and reflexively steps back as Oliver clings to a button of her blouse

'Ollie, what the fuck?' Thea hisses

'You need to calm down' Oliver replies, resting his head against her, feeling her heart beat slowing now the panic had stopped at the very least 'I know a lot of things have just come to light, but we need to do something about this, and me doing this was the only way to get either of you to do anything besides yell at each other. Speedy, i'm not asking you to forgive her right now, I'm not...' he doesn't need to look away from Thea's face to know Moira's expression fell '... but we need to all work together, figure out where we go from here with what we know as well as find a way to fix me if at all possible'

It was then he was given one bit of good news, that being other than the fact he'd been keeping secrets Thea wasn't mad at him like she was their mother, she teased him 'Aw, but I was beginning to warm to the idea of having a little brother, plus the Tom Thumb look is kind of cute' Thea smirks and runs her finger gently up and down his back 'Plus I like the symmetry, I've been throwing myself at my brother for the last couple months, and then my shrunken little brother throws himself at me. Good thing my shirt wasn't open or we'd have lost you between my girls' she giggles and cups her breasts with her hands, completely enveloping the shrunken archer, though only for a moment before releasing them. 'So, what can we do?' she asks

Oliver turns his head 'Mom, what is the plan?'

The eldest Queen sighs 'The Undertaking is something I only knew about in broad strokes, it was Malcolm's baby ever since he came back from Nanda Parbot or however it was pronounced. What I understood was that it was a plan to clean out the Glades of the decay that it was spreading to the rest of the city, Malcolm, Robert and Eobard knew the most about the details. Oliver's actions have had Malcolm speed up the schedule for the Undertaking, as in less than a year. The only good news is we're not in the Glades so we hopefully won't be directly affected, but given this incident I'm not sure if believing Merlyn is really a good idea' she explains as Oliver listens while making his way up to Thea's shoulder so he wasn't hanging off her chest for the entire conversation

'Yeah, I hadn't managed to find anything else from the people I spoke to, though at least I have a List of all the people in the group responsible for the Undertaking. Now while I'm sure this size would be useful for stealth, it's very bad if I were to get caught, so if you could fix my size or at least find out if it were possible' Oliver says as corroboration,

What happens?

1) Moira suggests she tells Malcolm they need another vial, explaining she'd been spooked by one of the kids sneaking up on her and causing her to drop and shatter it. When she gets it, Thea has to try stop herself from using the new vial even partly on Moira (seeing as she did at least want Oliver to get fixed eventually), though whether she does or not remains to be seen
2) There was a little of the substance still in the vial, not enough to remove more than a few inches but Oliver thinks they should give it to Felicity, who could either find a way to reverse it, or find where Merlyn got the stuff, because if you make something like this you make an antidote as quick as possible.
14523112223.title: Oliver get some attention, and convinces Thea t...

145234.content: After traveling with the Legends Sara remembers about Nyssa and feels bad for abandoning her. Nyssa is not pleased with Sara's actions so Sara brings her a present hoping to make up for her mistake.
145234.title: More Options

choices: Giant woman from Supergirl in another Earth
Giant woman from the flash in Supergirl World
Giant woman from Arrow in Supergirl World
1452342.content: Maybe we should use someone from Supergirl with a gigantic size in the flash/arrow world ?
1452342.title: Giantesses options ?

14523421.content:
Given Supergirl doesn't have its own world jumping explanations, how about:

Kara fiddling with the portal device Cisco gave her and finding herself in a world where she's a giant.

Or...

One of her friends (read here as almost any other female in the show, besides main villains) finds the device, not knowing what it is and accidentally activate it, falling through the portal and finding themselves in a Gulliver style scenario, lost and confused.

[Sorry about the poor formatting of this, only 2 option slots available for me and I didn't want to lock people into either Kara or the breacher device idea]
14523421.title: Giant woman from Supergirl in another Earth

choices: Barry is coming...but he doesn't know her. It's not the same Earth !
Barry is not coming, Kara gets bored and wants to have some fun now
Kara feels like a goddess, and tries to resist it
Kara goes to Star City instead, maybe Barry is with Oliver
145234211.content:
It was a time of peace at National City. No vilain to fight, only some stupid robbers to stop, how boring this was for Kara who never understood why they kept trying to steal some banks in the city of the girl of steel. She also began to be bored of watching tv and eating pizza, maybe because her sister Alex was in vacations with Maggie. So, Kara was alone, bored, and with nothing interesting to do.

As she was checking her fridge to get some ideas about what to eat tonight, she suddenly remembered about the device Cisco gave to her just in case. Kara then forgot about the fridge and went to her room to take the device. Maybe Barry and Oliver are in troubles and would like some help ? Well, Oliver is too pride and annoying, but at last Kara thought she might get some fun with Barry. Kara made her decision, happy to take a visit to her friend.

Once she put her suit,she pushed the button on the device, openning a portal where Kara walked througt in. The whole environnement became blur and full of color, and it took a few seconds before she arrived to Barry's Earth...but things were totally different, and...weird.

In fact, Kara's landing in the middle of a city, caused a building to get destroyed...problem was that, the building was small...really small. Small enought that it's destruction was caused by Kara's leg only.

"Huh....what's the hell ? " Kara wondered. "Last time i've been there, things were "bigger" " she said confused at her miniaturized environnement.

It took a short time before several tinies scream could be heard without using her super-ear. Kara, as Supergirl had to admit : she was a giant ! and she was causing some chaos without doing anything ! She tried to address to the people below : " hey calm down i'm not going to hurt you ! I just want to see ba...hmmm i mean the flash ".

There were obviously no answer from the panicked people, but Kara knew that it was a matter of time before Barry notices her, because of her new size. All she had to do was to wait...
145234211.title: Thinking with Portals

1452342113.content:
Kara sighs deeply, waiting around is boring when she can't even really move, all these bug people made her wary to even take another step, worried she might crush some of them. They were so small and fragile, she could do anything and they couldn't stop her. It made her think back to when she first arrived on Earth 38, she had gone from a well of teen on Krypton, Heir to the Great House of El, to Earth, where she had the powers of a God... but also loads of people scolding her for not being ordinary. Couple that with a distinct lack of purpose due to the baby she was supposed to protect being a man in his 30's Kara had been directionless and unhappy for quite a while.

The void had been filled for the most part by being Supergirl but like she had discussed with Cat, there were still so many restrictions, as well as the fact she knew if she put a toe out of line, General Lane of some other xenophobic arse would pump her full of kryptonite faster than you could say Lex Luthor. Those underlying restrictions made her role as Supergirl difficult at times, as well as her cousin's ''No killing the bad guys'' rule, even though he'd killed Zod, she still got it in the butt when he heard that she killed Non.

This new earth was a breath of fresh air to the Kryptonian, she could feel her powers grow even stronger as the yellow sun energized her massive form, probably why she was getting tired of waiting around, all that energy building up inside her. She had gone from being a citizen of a species who's level of technology made them look like magical beings to the less advanced races (humans included), then she was sent to a planet which gave her god like power and abilities, now this accident gave her the stature of one, she was a literal goddess to these people.

That thought began to burrow into her mind as she rose from the ground, debris falling from her boots and winds picking up as she moved, pulled her legs into a seated position and wrapped her cape around her legs before lowering down to the ground, crushing smaller structures due to her increased area but she didn't mind right now. Next her eyes zeroed in on a human, reaching out she grabbed him and brought him to her face. He curled in on himself, shuddering as Kara pouts 'Don't we afraid' she whispered, though to him it was as if she was loudly speaking at her normal size 'I'm not going to hurt you, not unneedelly. I'm Kara Zor-El. This city is now mine, I will keep it safe, no body will bring harm to it as long as I am around' while she was speaking to the human in her hand (it made it more personal in her mind to have a target to speak to) she was addressing most if not all of this little Central City, HER Central City. The human in her hand seems to believe her, moving from the fetal position to a kneeling one, kissing her palm, something that would be a useless gesture were Kara not able to feel it, and it made those thoughts get louder.

Smiling at the little one she stands again then places him on the roof of a building, luckily for him this building only reached Kara's chest, so when she took her classic pose and puffed out her chest, those twin zeppelins were all he could see.
